DOC.Title: Morning
DOC.TEXT: Principalities of neighboring countries make a tribute in honor of the virtue of the Chinese emperor. On the contrary, diplomatic relations (booklets) with Chinese hierarchical relationships between China and neighboring countries have been established by the emperor of China giving ranks and return items. It was also a kind of trade activity between China and neighboring countries before the Opium war.

DOC.Title: Prohibition of party labor
DOC.TEXT: A bureaucracial intellectual group (party) that consecrated Confucianism was forced to overturn the lifetime public office in an attempt to counter ecclesiastia. Even afterwards, the party was frequently repressed, and the ecclesia's professionalism strengthened rather.

DOC.Title: Yellow width turbulence
DOC.TEXT: Farmer rebellion of the late Han dynasty. Zhang Guanggu of the Taiping Province guided the poor farmers suffering from evil and natural disasters took part in the yellow hood and participated in the whole northern part of the country. The government suppressed the main force by the end of the same year with the cooperation of the ruling coalition, but the corresponding revolts corresponded in various places. Central politics became disarrayed, warlords of various places became independent, and the extinction of latter Han became definitive.

DOC.Title: Tension angle
DOC.TEXT: Founder of Taiping way. After collecting poor farmers and causing disturbance of the dyed wood in 184, the rebellion was destroyed because the disease died shortly afterwards.

DOC.Title: Taiping way
DOC.TEXT: Religious association organized by Zhang Huang in the second half of the second century BC later. He spent several hundreds of thousands of faithful attendants in Hebei, Shandong, Henan, which became the main cause of the yellow turbulence. Afterwards, it became a source of Taoism with the Gomotoshi way.

DOC.Title: Zhang Ming
DOC.TEXT: Birth and death unknown. Zhang Dolls. It is said that he went to the latter half of the Han Dynasty and founded Gomotoshi way, he called it Tenjin.

DOC.Title: Gosho American way
DOC.TEXT: It is also called Tianjin way. A religious association that Zhangling started in Shu (Sichuan Province) in the second half of the 2nd century. Mainly for treatment of illness by prayer, we sent out 5 rice (about 9 liters) as a thank you. It was established as a group by grandchild Zhang Lu, became a major force, formed a kind of religious kingdom in Shaanxi and Sichuan, but lost to Cao Cao 215. Its descendants formed Taoist 's Shoichi Class in Jiangxi and became the origin of Taoism.

DOC.Title: Yellow Old Thought
DOC.TEXT: The idea with unique universe viewpoint, fusing Terao's empty thought with the thought of a lawyer. "Elder" means Yellow Emperor and Laos. Early in Han Han, influenced on a wide range of people, emperors and bureaucrats were also adored.

DOC.Title: Confucianism
DOC.TEXT: A teaching that conspires Confucian thought as Confucius. At the time of Wuhan Wu Emperor Turned to government by the proposal of Tung Duong, became the orthodox teaching of the country. From then on to the Qing Dynasty, as an academic discipline useful for unifying the thought of the dynasty by the Tokugawa principle, maintaining the social order, he repressed Chinese emperor politics.

DOC.Title: Tunu Shu
DOC.TEXT: Confucian scholar in Han Chinese. I declared Confucianism to be the principle of keeping the unified state, set up Dr. Gomaga, and promoted orthodox teaching of Confucianism.

DOC.Title: Gemini
DOC.TEXT: The five most important scriptures of Confucianism. "Chomyo" "Shosetsu" "Shogun" "Pitti" "Spring Fall" in the Five Books, also called "handwritten". It is seen that the generic name of Goshiki was established when it was Emperor of Han Chinese.

DOC.Title: Dr. Goshi
DOC.TEXT: Government post established by the Emperor. Mission was to spread with Professor of the Gods. It became the beginning of Confucianism orthodoxification.

DOC.Title: romance study
DOC.TEXT: Academic aims to interpret the phrase "handwritten". Beginning in Han Dynasty, Han Hsing · Zheng Gene of Han Han left excellent commentary on "Handwriting".

DOC.Title: Liu Dong
DOC.TEXT: A scholar of the late Han Han. Classified and organized the books in the courtroom and invented the catalog.

DOC.Title: Zheng Xuan
DOC.TEXT: Later Han 's academicologist. After studying from horse melting, after devastating the work of the party worker, he devoted himself to study and tried to study "handwriting". Established ancient literature, greatly formed romance studies.

DOC.Title: Sima transition
DOC.TEXT: Historian of the Han Chinese. I will become a historian after my father. In defense of Shogun Lee Myeong captured by the lords of the past 99 years, he was subjected to the anger of the emperor and was sentenced to the punishment, but after that, he devoted all his power and completed "historical text".

DOC.Title: "Shiji"
DOC.TEXT: The history of China 's first telecommunications body. All 130 volumes. Shima Dynasty began around 104 years ago, and completed over 10 years later. I wrote from the Yellow Emperor to Emperor Wu (previous 122 years). It is divided into 12th century, 10th year table, 8th book, 30th house and 70th column. Careful description and the depth of human understanding are considered the highest peaks of historical documents.

DOC.Title: Kido body
DOC.TEXT: A form of history description that began with "Shiji" and completed with "Kanji". Make a historical account from the main (Akira's chronicle) · Ryugaku (Biographies of important people and foreign articles) · Tables (chronology) · Aspirations (various institutions). This composition centered on Miki / Ryuzo became the standard of Chinese Masashi type after that.

DOC.Title: Professor
DOC.TEXT: Later Han Historian. My older brother over the group. Following my father's spirit, he wrote "Chinese Book". After serving in the conquest, he joined the struggle in the court and died in prison.

DOC.Title: "Chinese Book"
DOC.TEXT: History book of the first generation of Han Han from the high-ranking high-ranking ancestry to the destruction of Wang Dynasty. It is described in the Kido body and consists of 120 volumes of 12th century, 8th year table, 10 centimeters and 70 rows. It was established around 1982, but after the death of the clan, the younger sister 's Sho Oshi repaired and completed. Confucianist color is strong, it was regarded as a model of Masashige as posthumous history as a dynasty history of orderly descriptive form. In addition, there is a description about Wa (Japan) for the first time in the geography of vol. 28 of "Kanji".

DOC.Title: "After-Han Book"
DOC.TEXT: One of Masashi Masaru who depicted the latter Han dynasties in the Kido body. Seoul of South Korean Song (398 ~ 445) compiled. It is composed of 120 volumes, and there is a description in Toyo Shimbun that the warrior country gave golden signs from Emperor Mitsutake.

DOC.Title: Zhejiang
DOC.TEXT: A latter Han scholar. It was excellent in poetry and invented the celestial giant seismograph as a natural scientist.

DOC.Title: Strange Thought
DOC.TEXT: Chinese ancient prophetic philosophy.讖 is a prophecy, a latitude is the meaning of "a weapon" for a "handwritten", it is influenced by the theory of Yin and Yang in the Qin Han dynasty, and predicted the catastrophe disaster and the destiny of human beings. Taken from the latter half of the latter half in the latter half, Wang Shi used this to grab the power.

DOC.Title: Booklet
DOC.TEXT: Old style of kanji. In the late period fonts with local differences were gradually sorted out and became books. There are Daisu which was mainly used in Qin in Warring States period and Ko 簡 which was simplified after Qin Unification.

DOC.Title: Booklet
DOC.TEXT: It is a practical type letter so that you can organize the strokes of a book and easily write it. It was widely used in Han Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Kusakabe
DOC.TEXT: A typeface that stems from writing a script quickly. Although it was used from the Han Dynasty, Zhang Zhi (? ~ 190), which was said at the end of the Han dynasty "Seiki", came out and developed after that.

DOC.Title: Bulletin
DOC.TEXT: It was a fake font that was converted from books, used for copperware and various inscriptions. It was used since the late Han, and it was said to be an orthodox book.

DOC.Title: Line book
DOC.TEXT: In the late Han, a typeface born from a book. Use it when it is not as angular as Scotch. It was completed by Wang Feng Yu of Won Jin, Wang Zhiyuniyu and others.

DOC.Title: "Letter Explanation"
DOC.TEXT: The oldest dictionary in China compiled by Shinzo of Hanshin later. Volume 15. I explained 9353 Kozo from the formation of letters and made clear the literal. It is regarded as the founder of the dictionary. There are many school notebooks of the progeny.

DOC.Title: Wooden note / bamboo strip
DOC.TEXT: An elongated piece of wood chips and bamboo strips used to write letters. Bamboo strips and small wood chips were used in the Sengoku / Qin Han, rarely used as a material (textile) as a material to write letters. Wooden letters · Bamboo letters flatten the surface, drilled small holes on both sides, and bound with a string. The thing we call is called a volume or volume. The woodcut of Han dynasty is from Dunhuang · Residence, the bamboo chapter excavated from Changsha period in the age of warring States.

DOC.Title: Fabric (silk cloth)
DOC.TEXT: Silk fabric used to write letters. Not only letters but also paintings are drawn, with high artistic value.

DOC.Title: Cai Lun
DOC.TEXT: Eunuch of the latter Han. He invented the papermaking method and presented it to the Japanese emperor in 105 years and was told that he left the name of "Cai Ji Paper" but he was a refiner of the papermaking law, and paper existed before that.

DOC.Title: Paper making technology
DOC.TEXT: Cai Lun is said to have improved papermaking technology made from fiber materials such as bark, hemp, polo and fishnet. This papermaking technique says that in 751 the West Bank was fought with the battle on the bank of the Thalas river.

DOC.Title: Silk
DOC.TEXT: Silk threads and silk fabrics made from silkworm cocoons. It is said to have occurred in the Yin during the special product of China. For the Han dynasty, excellent silk threads were made, silk trade developed.

DOC.Title: Buddhism inherited
DOC.TEXT: Although it was transmitted to the Han dynasty via the western region, it did not popular in general.

DOC.Title: Indio, Indian
DOC.TEXT: It is a collective name of Native Americans other than Inuit (Eskimo). It was the origin of the name that Columbus mistakenly believed the destination to be India. When the Bering Strait is in the middle of the province some Asian people migrated and it is said to have spread. From the primitive agricultural stage, Maya · Aztec · Inca etc had reached civilization level. The battle with conquistadors, the harsh labor after conquest, the epidemic, etc. caused a sharp decline in the population.

DOC.Title: Corn
DOC.TEXT: Cultivated plants originating from the Americas, along with potatoes, sweet potatoes, Tapacho, tomatoes, etc. Since around 2000, it was cultivated mainly on the mountains and plains of Central America and Andes, rather than hot and humid coastal lowlands. It can be said that the ancient civilization of both North and South America was established on this corn cultivation.

DOC.Title: Mesoamerican civilization, Central America civilization
DOC.TEXT: Generic name of ancient civilization that occurred from the Mexican plateau to Central America. Olmecca civilization · Teotihuacan civilization · Maya civilization · Aztec civilization etc.

DOC.Title: Olmecca civilization
DOC.TEXT: Pictograms were used in urban civilization centered on the temple, which prospered in the Gulf Coast region in the Mexico since 1200 years ago. It seemed that it continued until around BC, and it also had a big influence on Teotihuacan civilization and Maya civilization.

DOC.Title: Teotihuacan civilization
DOC.TEXT: Ancient city civilization developed to Teotihuacan in the present Mexico City northeast. Buildings decorated with wall paintings and stone carvings were lined around the stone large pyramid-shaped temple (the pyramid of the sun).

DOC.Title: Maya civilization, Maya's city state
DOC.TEXT: Civilization centered around Yucatan Peninsula which flourished around the 4 th to 14 th century. Beginning in about 500 years ago, around the 4th century, cities and classes were established in various places and had stone staircase pyramids (Maya's temple), two decades, pictograms (Maya characters). The tenth-thirteenth century was at its peak, a city alliance was formed. It was conquered by the Spaniards in the 16th century and disappeared.

DOC.Title: Pictogram, Maya character, Hieroglyphs
DOC.TEXT: In recent years a part of it has been deciphered, the history of the Mayan civilization from the end of the 3rd century to the beginning of the 10th century is becoming more evident.

DOC.Title: Torteka civilization
DOC.TEXT: A civilization that took place in the Mexican plateau following the Teotihuacan civilization. Tolteca is an "excellent worker" meaning the leadership that played the culture of each region. They did not disperse, develop, and unify in various places.

DOC.Title: Chichimeca family
DOC.TEXT: Ethnic people who lived in northern Mexico. Since the 10th century, while hitting the Torteka forces, southward, absorbing the cultures of the tribes, and building the Aztec civilization etc.

DOC.Title: Aztec tribe
DOC.TEXT: Ethnic groups who built the 14th century Aztec empire. In the middle of the 12th century I entered the Mexico Central Plateau, built the capital Tenochtitlan in the middle of the 14th century Lake Tescoko, dominated the central plateau by controlling other tribes.

DOC.Title: Aztec empire, Aztec kingdom, Aztec civilization
DOC.TEXT: Empire built by the Aztecs from the 12th century to the 16th century Mexico Plateau (civilization). In the center of the Tenochtitlan, priesthood politics by the priesthood ranks were held. I had a temple, a pyramid, a hieroglyph, a solar calendar, but ironware and wheels were not used. In 1521, it was conquered by Cortez of Spain.

DOC.Title: Tenochtitlan
DOC.TEXT: City of Aztec kingdom. It was a magnificent stone city built on an island in Lake Tesco, but was occupied by Cortes in 1521. It is now part of Mexico's capital Mexico City.

DOC.Title: Andean civilization
DOC.TEXT: Generic name of ancient civilization that occurred in the Andean mountain range in South America. Chapin civilization · Motica civilization · Nasca civilization · Tiawanaco civilization · Inca civilization.

DOC.Title: Chavin civilization
DOC.TEXT: Ancient civilization formed in northern Peru 1000 years ago. Early in the Andean civilization.

DOC.Title: Wari civilization
DOC.TEXT: Civilization spread to central Andes after the disappearance of Chavin civilization. The existence of a powerful kingdom (ruler) is unidentified, but features are found in earthenware and architecture.

DOC.Title: Nazca civilization
DOC.TEXT: The southern coast of Peru, the Kawauchi ruins of the Nazca River basin is central. Huge ground paintings and highly detailed and delicate Sayumi pottery are famous.

DOC.Title: Tiwanaco civilization
DOC.TEXT: Civilization flourished in the highlands of Bolivia. There are numerous religious buildings in Tiwanako.

DOC.Title: Chimoo Empire
DOC.TEXT: Peru, an empire developed into the mouth of Moce. Inherited the motivational civilization known for pyramids and others, it possessed advanced textile and metal craft techniques. It was reduced to the Inca Empire, but its technology and culture was inherited.

DOC.Title: Quechua tribe
DOC.TEXT: Ethnicity residing in Peru / Bolivia. Formed the Inca Empire.

DOC.Title: Inca Empire, Inca civilization
DOC.TEXT: Empire (civilization) built by Incas in the Andes highland (Quechua, meaning "Inca and" the child of the sun "). In tradition, it occurred in the shore of Lake Titicaca, and since the 12th century, the integration of various kingdoms that had been established at the foot of the Andean Plateau and the valley advanced. In the 15th century, we started a rapid conquest activity, we dominated the extensive area of ​​2000km north and south from Ecuador to Chile now, Maintaining the highway network (the royal road) accompanied by the Ekiden system centered on the city of Cusco I made integration. A sophisticated Inca civilization featuring temple, palace, miyakonojo and keeps using extremely developed masonry technology flourished, but it was destroyed by Spanish conquistad Pizarro in 1533.

DOC.Title: Cusco
DOC.TEXT: The capital of the Inca Empire built in the Peru Plateau. It is known for its advanced stone architectural remains. It was destroyed by Pizarro in 1533.

DOC.Title: Machu Picchu
DOC.TEXT: The city of the Inca Empire built on the steep terrain of altitude 2,500 m in the mountainous region north of Cusco. The palaces and temples, dwelling and waterways are lined up in order, which shows the high level of culture.

DOC.Title: Keep, tie rope
DOC.TEXT: A way to indicate meaning and quantity by rope knotting method instead of letters. It was used for population statistics and tax collection in the Inca Empire.

DOC.Title: Wei Jin Nanboku
DOC.TEXT: Age from Wei's founding to Sui's unification of China. Different ethnic groups invaded into North China one after another, a powerful central administration was not born, and dynastic change was frequent.

DOC.Title: Three Kingdoms Period
DOC.TEXT: The era when the three countries of Wei, Wu and Shu died and fought after the latter Han died. In 263 Shu was destroyed by Wei, Wei and Wu were destroyed by Shin and the Mikuni era ended.

DOC.Title: Cao
DOC.TEXT: One of the guns of the late Han dynasty. Having held the real power of North China, aiming at unification throughout the country, in 208 the defeat to the Allied forces of Liu Bei and Sunkuan for the battle of Red Mawk, it became the pattern of three times. In 216, we became Wei.

DOC.Title: Battle of Red Mask
DOC.TEXT: Wei's Cao Cao is a battle war fought with the Allied Forces of Liu Bei and Sunko and the red wall of the Yangtze River Basin. Wei's warship ships were defeated in numerous strikes.

DOC.Title: Cao, Emperor Emperor
DOC.TEXT: Wei's first emperor (ruling 220 ~ 226). Cao's child. Throne by the Zen introduction of the late Han emperor. It is known that literary genius was rich as well.

DOC.Title: Zenson
DOC.TEXT: When exchanging the dynasty · To give way to peacefully the former dynasty because of the high virtue of the ruler of the new dynasty. In fact, even though the new dynasty deprived the government with arms, it often appeared in such a form.

DOC.Title: Wei
DOC.TEXT: The strongest country of the three countries. Cao Cao became Wei Wang, Cao Cao was established about the throne. The capital is Luoyang. Owned North China, destroyed 263 Shu, but was robbed of the country by Simaitis and was destroyed.

DOC.Title: Luoyang
DOC.TEXT: City of Wei. Cao Cao determined.

DOC.Title: Liu Bei
DOC.TEXT: Founder of Shu. Akira Emperor (ranking 221 to 223). He called the descendants of the Han Chamber and served as a descendant, taking the restoration of the Han. Mr. Zhuge Liang as president, realized the three-minute race with Wei · Kure, but was defeated in the fight with Kure, died of the disease at Shiroi Castle.

DOC.Title: Shu
DOC.TEXT: One of the three countries. Liu Mercial founded in Sichuan. Chengdu is the capital. In 2 generations wei destroyed.

DOC.Title: Chengdu
DOC.TEXT: City of Shu. Central city of Sichuan.

DOC.Title: Magisaki, Kotomi
DOC.TEXT: Shu 's Prime Minister. He made a total of three minutes of heaven, succeeded in the alliance of Liu Bei and Sojitz, and contributed to the victory of the Red Battle Battle. After the death of Liu Bei, wei and fought, fought in Goshihara.

DOC.Title: grand prize
DOC.TEXT: Emperor of the first Kure (ranking 222 ~ 252). In 208, coalesced with Liu Bei, defeated Cao's army into a red wall and established forces in Gangnam. Although it was sealed by Wu King from Wei, it became independent in 222 against Cao and Liu Bei. In 229 he called the emperor, decided to build the capital.

DOC.Title: Kure
DOC.TEXT: One of the three countries. Sun Kingdom founded in Gangnam. The capital is built. It fainted in the struggle of clans, and it was destroyed by Shin in four generations.

DOC.Title: Construction
DOC.TEXT: City of Kure. Current Nanjing. It became the center of Gangnam's politics, economics and culture, and East and Southern Dynasty also became the capital. It was renamed Jigenge in the East Jin era.

DOC.Title: Simaitis, Wushi
DOC.TEXT: The first Emperor of Shin (Rim 265-290). Wei's Deputy Minister Shima's grandchild. We reigned with Zen of Wei and reigned, and in 280, destroyed Wu and unified China. We implemented the Toyota formula and the Otsuda · Ochida system.

DOC.Title: Jin, Nishin Jin
DOC.TEXT: Shiba is a founding country. The capital is Luoyang. Unified China with Kure, but the powerful forces were strongly confused by the civil war of the royal family, destroyed by the fellows in 4 generations. The following year, the family of Shiba Shima founded East Jin in Gangnam.

DOC.Title: Luoyang
DOC.TEXT: City of Western Jin.

DOC.Title: Hachioji's Ran
DOC.TEXT: Civil war caused by family members who occurred at the end of West Jin. Because the foreigners multiplied the power monopoly by multiplying the incompetence of the Emperor of the Emperor, the eight kings of Mr. Shiba 's clan kidnapped the power and fought power for the first time. Because the king used the military force of neighboring people, it invaded Gwu.

DOC.Title: Goku
DOC.TEXT: It is a collective term of the group 5 of the northern group 匈 羯 · 羯 · virgin and the Tibetan 氐 ·. Some of these different ethnic groups were allowed to migrate from the latter Han to the Three Kingdoms era and were in contact with the Chinese culture but they invaded Hachioji's turbulence and invaded Northeast and built the country in various places .

DOC.Title: 匈 奴
DOC.TEXT: It split in the north and south in 48 years, the southern Shao belonged to Han Han and moved to subnormal war. By the Hachioji turbulence, Liu Buchi was soldiers in Shanxi, and built the Han (304) later Han (later Zhao).

DOC.Title: 羯
DOC.TEXT: Another faction of a fool. At that time, I lived in Shanxi, founded Zhao 319 years later.

DOC.Title: Vividness
DOC.TEXT: Nomads who are said to be Mongolian or Turkish. Initially he was apprenticed to the fagus, after which each tribe took over the inner Mongolia and adopted Chinese culture. Mr. Takuzuki founded Northern Wei in the second half of the 4th century and unified North China.

DOC.Title: 氐
DOC.TEXT: A Tibetan ethnic group of half-farming half-pastord who lived in the Northwest Frontier of China from the 2nd century. Former Hata Ken has unified the Northern Temporary temporary.

DOC.Title: 羌
DOC.TEXT: Tibetan nomads who lived in the Qinghai region.

DOC.Title: Liu Yucho
DOC.TEXT: The royal family of a fool. Han (Zhao Zhao) was built by multiplying the confusion of Xi Jin, became the first emperor (rank 304-310).

DOC.Title: Yaka's Ran
DOC.TEXT: The war dead which mainly occurred in the hero who occurred during the Yongja Year of the West Jin Dynasty (307-312). Liu Sato, a child of Liu Buchu who built Han by multiplying Hachioji 's turbulence, occupied Luoyang in 311 and caught Emperor, and in 316 it went down to Emperor of Chang'an and destroyed West Jin. After that, North China entered the era of the turmoil of Zhu 16 countries.

DOC.Title: Shiba 睿
DOC.TEXT: The first Emperor of East Jin (ranking 317 ~ 322). Primei After the destruction of Western Jin, he founded East Jin with the support of aristocrats and indigenous clans who emigrated from North China.

DOC.Title: Higashi Jin
DOC.TEXT: Shiba is a founding country. The capital is Kenzu. Although the monarchy was weak and political fighting continued, the development of Gangnan advanced, aristocratic culture was formed.

DOC.Title: Kenji
DOC.TEXT: City of eastern Jin and South Korea. Current Nanjing. Originally construction.

DOC.Title: Zhu 16 countries
DOC.TEXT: It is a collective term of 13 countries of Gomu and three countries of Han Chinese who rushed in North China, from the founding of Han by fangs to the northernmost unification of Northern Wei. For the first time a part of China entered under the control of a different race. Gufu tried to introduce Chinese culture, but the war caused the northern ruin, the production declined due to the resettlement of the residents to the south.

DOC.Title: Previous Qin
DOC.TEXT: The founder of Chang'an is the founder of Chang'an. Although it unified the northernmost temporary at the time of three generations, it fainted to East Jin and fainted, and it was destroyed in six generations.

DOC.Title: North and South morning era
DOC.TEXT: The era when the unified dynasty coexisted in Kangnam and North China, conflicting. Four dynasties in Gangnam, five dynasties in North China, the end of the unity of Sui.

DOC.Title: South Korea
DOC.TEXT: Four dynasties of Song, Qi, Liang, Chen after the destruction of East Jin. Every capital is Kenzo. Brave force was strong, monarchy was weak, and he was always on defense against North Korea. Maintaining the legitimacy of Han Chinese culture, aristocratic culture called Six Morning culture developed.

DOC.Title: Song
DOC.TEXT: Toupe's warrant Liu Hiroshi (Emperor) is a founding country by Zen zen. It declined due to the invasion of Tae Emperor of Northern Wei, and it decreased in eight generations.

DOC.Title: Liu Hiroshi
DOC.TEXT: The first emperor of South Korean Song (ranking 420-422). Wu Emperor. In west commander of East Jin, he restrained temporary Nakahara. The Zen committed throne, implements the earth crush method with suppressing the forces of the ruling.

DOC.Title: Qi
DOC.TEXT: Sung's warlord Xiamen Road (Takao) is a founding country by Zensuke. It decreased in 7's.

DOC.Title: Beam
DOC.TEXT: Samsung's Emperor's family Xiao Xian (Emperor) is a founding country. It came to the heyday of South Morning culture, but suffering from the pressure of West Wei and declining in six generations.

DOC.Title: Chen
DOC.TEXT: The warrior Chen Chai Wang of the Liang (Wushi) is a founding country by Zen zen. In the fifth generation was destroyed by the Sui, the southern morning was over.

DOC.Title: North North
DOC.TEXT: From the North Wei who unified the Zhu 16 countries, the 5 dynasties of East Wei, West Wei, North Kitakyushu and the northern Zhou. The monarchy was stronger than the South Korean morning, land system, tax system, military system was established, and it was accepted to Sui · Tang.

DOC.Title: North Wei
DOC.TEXT: Takuzuki is a founding country. Placed the capital in Heijo, deconstructed the tribal system and adopted a Chinese tyranny system. The 3rd generation Wu Emper unified North China in 439. Hwaseong Taebong sentenced to Luoyang in 494 and carried out aggressive Chinese politics policy. It split in 534 East and West.

DOC.Title: Heijo
DOC.TEXT: The capital from the Northern Wei Road Wu Emperor to Luoyang Capital of Takanori Emperor (398-494). Current Shanxi Datong Datong.

DOC.Title: Mr. Taku
DOC.TEXT: Some of the fresh base. In 386 Takuziya (Wu Emperor, ranking 386 to 409) founded Northern Wei.

DOC.Title: Takuke State
DOC.TEXT: A series of dynasties ranging from the North in North Wei to the Sui and Tang. There are many from Mr. Takui in the ruling class, and the designation from the fact that the structure of the nation has many common points.

DOC.Title: Heavyweight
DOC.TEXT: Northern Wei third emperor (rank 423-452). Unified Northeast in 439, threatening the Southern Song Sung. By heavily using 寇 之, Taoism as the state religion, Buddhism suppression (abolished Buddha) was carried out.

DOC.Title: Takanemon
DOC.TEXT: Northern Wei sixth emperor (ruling 471-499). Incorporated, such as the Masuda and Sanjo system, in 494 the capital to Luoyang. We thoroughly enforced Hanatization policy to make clothing, language, etc. Chinese style.

DOC.Title: Han formation policy
DOC.TEXT: Prohibition of Hu clothing and vulgar language · Introduction of Chinese bureaucracy system, with surname as Chinese character, introduction of Chinese bureaucracy system, marriage with Han tribe and so on.

DOC.Title: Luoyang
DOC.TEXT: The capital of Northern Wei after the transition capital by Emperor Takayoshi (494-534).

DOC.Title: East Wei
DOC.TEXT: Northern Wei generals high rejoice founded Takashi Emperor, founding from the North Wei divided and founding. The capital is 鄴 (current Hebei Province). He dominated Hebei · Shandong. It was replaced by Kitaji.

DOC.Title: Xi Wei
DOC.TEXT: Northern Wei generals Utsumi Yasushi embassy (grandson of Takanori), founding from the North Wei divided. The capital is Chang'an. It dominated Shaanxi · Gansu. It was replaced by the northern circle.

DOC.Title: Kitaji
DOC.TEXT: The high-eyed son of a high-grade youth is founded by Zen zen. The capital is 鄴. It was destroyed in the northern circumference.

DOC.Title: Northern circumference
DOC.TEXT: A founding kingdom by Uen Wakami 's child Uzumi sense from West Wei. The capital is Chang'an. We annexed Beijing, but was killed by a foreign family Yang Deng.

DOC.Title: Nomination election
DOC.TEXT: Officer appointment system of Han dynasty. It began with Emperor of the Han Chinese, accepted by Later Han. The local minister recommends the provincial talented and virtuous people to the central, promoting the advancement of the local ruling siblings who joined the secretary to the central government.

DOC.Title: Kyushu Nakamaso, Kurogawa officials law
DOC.TEXT: In 220 years, the appointment system of government officials started with Wei's Bunmei Emperor, and was enforced during the Jin · North · North · Morning (especially East · Jin · South). The Chief Justice appointed from the center graded the local talent in nine grades (township) according to the reputation of the hometown, reported to the center, and the central office appointed the government office corresponding to it. Children of regional clans who were associated with Chief Justice officer got high townships, eventually monopolizing the central higher ranking officials and led to the formation of the nobleman.

DOC.Title: Chief Administrator
DOC.TEXT: Official placed in a state / county in Kyushu Nakamaso. In many cases the bureaucrats appointed from the center took the job and rated the local talent by nine grades based on ability and virtue and reported to the center.

DOC.Title: "Elegantly without a cold gate, vulgarly without a bosom"
DOC.TEXT: Words that gave rise to monopoly of high-ranking government officials of nine goods Nakamasa. Kanmon refers to a socially incompetent low family, and the Bao points to a powerful clan.

DOC.Title: Tunta system
DOC.TEXT: A system in which the state cultivates group farmers on public land owned by the state. For the Han Dynasty, it was set up for self-sufficiency of Frontier Guard soldiers (Military). In addition to military duty, Wei 's Cao Cao recruited migrants and general farmers to cultivate migrants and general farmers, and collected 5-60% of marriage to make the country the main source of revenue.

DOC.Title: Okita · Lawyer's Law
DOC.TEXT: Land system implemented by Emperor Wu of Jin (Jin Jin) in 280. The Otsuda law is a system that mainly imposes general rules on land ownership in accordance with their status and economic power to general farmers, imposing taxes, veterans, military service, etc. In addition, the Law on Tanada is a measure that ensures tax revenue by forcibly allocating public land to farmers and cultivating them. Although details are unknown in any case, it is evaluated as a land system leading to Hitoda of Northern Wei.

DOC.Title: door style
DOC.TEXT: The tax system of Jin (Xi Jin). I got the product (silk · cotton) collected per door.

DOC.Title: Masuda, Northern Wea Judaism
DOC.TEXT: Land system implemented by Takafumi Emperor of North Wei in 485. Suppressing ownership of large land, farmers were awarded and collected land according to age, gender, etc., strengthening control, securing and increasing tax revenue. Preventing aristocratic luxury government official monopoly, opening the way to officials equally according to capacity, aiming to strengthen monarchy. Following the Sui system, the establishment of the Legislative System, the Legislative System, the Orientation System, the Temporal Control System and the Beijing Army System, the area was expanded, became the center of politics, economics and culture of the East Asian world, the international and aristocratic culture matured. Declined since the middle of the 8th century, it was destroyed in 20 years 300 years.

DOC.Title: State prefecture system
DOC.TEXT: Regional administrative district system established in the Sui and Tang period. We abolished the county of the past, divide the whole country into states, divide the state into prefectures, dispatched ministers from the provinces and provinces from the center. In Tang Dynasty divided the whole land into 10 roads in 627, and in the year 733 of Genji sect, 15 provinces, let the province / prefecture belong. After the turbulence of Anshi the clan area was also called the road. We also established a prefecture in three important cities of Chang'an, Luoyang, Taiyuan.

In Tang Degree is Criminal Code, Ordinance is Administrative Law or Civil Code, Case is supplementary revision provision of Law and Decree, Expression is Detailed Enforcement of Law · Order. It settled in the Sui and Tang dynasty, the nation's regime was established, and it had a big influence on the East Asian countries as well.

DOC.Title: Examination, Tang examination
DOC.TEXT: Appointment system of officials by subject examination, succeeding the Sui system. The subjects were divided into high school students, Ming and senior high school students, and others. The examination consisted of three stages, and it was appointed after passing the preliminary exam of the province (villain examination), the examination of the reward department after coming to Tokyo (campaign), finally the recruitment exam performed by the cabinet.
