DOC.Title: Nagashida
DOC.TEXT: Kuwata from Northern Wei to Sui. Land where hereditary assault to descendants was approved. 20 mou was paid to Ding and Mid-man, obliged to plant a certain number of mulberry, jujube and elm.

DOC.Title: Official Nagasatada
DOC.TEXT: Nagasukida given to high-level bureaucrats. Although the area varies depending on the official position, it is said that there were some 10,000 ridges. Patriotism / trading was allowed.

DOC.Title: Temporal control system, Tang Tempo system
DOC.TEXT: Tang tax system corresponding to Hitoda. As a duty to Ding-man as mortar, two millets a year, Yuan as 20 Year 20 (22 Years a year) labor provision (or 3 rulers per day if instead of silk / rice, 3 × 7 7 cm 5 cm for cloth) ), As a tone imposed 2 yarns of cotton and silk (絁) and 3 cottons, if it is cloth 2 5 5 尺 and 3 hepp. Although this bought the financial stability, in the 8th century it collapsed with the development of large land ownership, and shifted to both tax laws in 780.

DOC.Title: role
DOC.TEXT: Matter of labor. He is responsible for the labor service at the central government (primary role), and labor service at the local government office is called miscellaneous.

DOC.Title: Miscellaneous
DOC.TEXT: A kind of labor in Tang dynasty. In the meaning of miscellaneous light labor, it refers to temporary work such as civil engineering work at local authorities and storage and transportation of taxes. It was also imposed on middle man and disabled persons. It is said that Ting Dyne imposed within 40 days a year (there is also a theory of 50 days).

DOC.Title: prefectural military regime
DOC.TEXT: Army system which was done in Xi Wei, Northern Zhou, Sui and Tang. In Tang, the negotiating officials throughout the country chose a robust army person from among Dingbo at the rate of one in every three people, training once every three years at the farming season, and made them a sage or a guard. During the period of military service he was exempt from taxation, but weapons, clothes etc were self-defeating and it was a heavy burden for farmers. Although the prefectural military regime was operated in conjunction with the Hitoda system and the monetary system, it collapsed with the decline of the Masuda regime, and replaced the solicitation system.

DOC.Title: Masters
DOC.TEXT: A soldier who defends the city.

DOC.Title: Dog guard
DOC.TEXT: Soldier who is a frontier defense.

DOC.Title: negotiating office
DOC.TEXT: Military established by Tang in various places. We attended the drills, training and mobilizing the prefectural soldiers. When it was most frequented, it climbed to 634 places, but concentrated in the vicinity of Chang'an · Luoyang, the rest were placed north, and the farmers in the province where the negotiating office was not placed were not subjected to military service.

DOC.Title: Government
DOC.TEXT: After the Three Kingdoms period, the institution put in charge of military administration of several states. The secretary is the Tokyo. In modern Tang Dynasty it was replaced by moderation.

DOC.Title: Miyakefu
DOC.TEXT: An institution established to rule the neighboring peoples in Tang. Tang established the prefectures and provinces in the areas of the tribes to which he belonged, appointed the tribal chief as the minister, kept the municipal office above them, supervised officials and troops from the center and supervised. In the first half of the Tang 6 capitals has been established.

DOC.Title: Andong Guard Office
DOC.TEXT: It was established in Pyongyang destroying Koguryo in 668 and reigned Korea / China Tohoku region. Moved to Liaoyang in 676, it was abolished once in 698. It revived in 705, but it was abolished during the turbulence of Anshi.

DOC.Title: Anpheon Guard Office
DOC.TEXT: In 622 Ha Noi established the Greater Central Administration of Gifu Prefecture, renamed 679 Anseong Guard Office. In 860 and 863, it was occupied by Namingo (Tibetan Burmese of Yunnan), then disappeared in independence of Vietnam.

DOC.Title: Anpheon Guard Office
DOC.TEXT: In 647, the Yanpu Muyu Office was established in the outside Mongolia, it was renamed Rimhae 663, Anh North, 669. Together with the rebirth of Higashinchi that moved to the Yamayama area.

DOC.Title: Single Asian Guardian
DOC.TEXT: It was established near Hohhot for inner Mongol governance, after the prime of the East in 650. In 663, the Uzumaka Municipal Government replaced it, and the following year it was renamed as Yuanshan Guard.

DOC.Title: Anshan capital Fortune
DOC.TEXT: It was set up destroying 640 Takashi, moved to the tortoise in 648. Although it was the center of Western business management, it was destroyed by spending 790 years.

DOC.Title: North Garden City Guardians
DOC.TEXT: In 702, it was set up in Bishbalik near the garden state (now north of Jimsa in the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region) and served as Governor of Jungaria. In 790, it was occupied by vomit.

DOC.Title: policy ___
DOC.TEXT: A relaxing policy taken by the successive dynasties of China against foreign peoples. In Tang, Miyako was dispatched from the center, indirect governance permitting autonomy was carried out by appointing the chief of the area as the city director and the taste t.

DOC.Title: Misery of Munei
DOC.TEXT: Rule It is said that after Tenmutake and his deprivation the administration took power and confused the politics of Tang.

DOC.Title: Law Temmori
DOC.TEXT: The only empress in China history (ranking 690-705). Initially entered the back shrine of Tajong, became the Empress of Kojong after the death. Grabbed the administration under the disease of Takajong, after the death of Takaji, he abdicated the children 's Munjong and Jongjong, throne and ranked the country name as the Emperor of the Holy Ghost.

DOC.Title: Zhou
DOC.TEXT: Rule The dynasty built after Tenmu. It is also called Wushan. Based on the system of Zhou as a model, he forcibly carried out new construction of Noritian letters, protection of Buddhism and large-scale civil engineering work. Actively appointed bureaucrats and rejected the nobility of the battlefield, but Chu Jongjong restored after taking the old Takeuchi, restored the Tang, Zhou ended in one generation.

DOC.Title: Nakajima
DOC.TEXT: Tang 's 4th emperor (rank 683-684, 705-710). Throne with the death of Takaji, but was abolished after the rule of mother after Tenmu. Afterwards it was poisoned by the Empress' lap.
Empress of Nakamune. In pursuit of the administration in 710, he poisoned Jungjong, but was killed by Li Long (later Genkong).

DOC.Title: Genko
DOC.TEXT: Tang 6th Emperor (ranking 712-756). After defeating the faction, he restored his father Shukjong, afterwards he was throne and throne. In the first half of the reign, I used a mastership to show the stable period of the Tang called "the rebirth of Kuomon", but I loved Yang Qin-young in his later years, disturbed politics, abandoned politics and abdicated while fleeing to Sichuan due to the turbulence of Anshi.

DOC.Title: "Governance of Kuromon"
DOC.TEXT: Words made to honor the first half of reign of Genkyo during the opening year. It is said that cultures prospered by reforming politics under the guardian, stabilizing farmers' livelihood.

DOC.Title: recruitment system
DOC.TEXT: A mercenary system implemented on behalf of the military regime (conscription system) in the 8th century. Because of the collapse of the Masuda-shi (the falling of the farmers), it became difficult to implement the military service, so in September 2000 Genkjun recruited 120,000 soldiers. In 749, the prefectural military policy was abolished in full, and it was replaced by the recruitment system after that.

DOC.Title: moderation use
DOC.TEXT: Commander of the soldier army corps set up in the frontier in preparation for neighboring different ethnic groups. Beginning with the establishment of the Kawanishi moderator in 710, the 10th degree was used in Genji sect. After the turbulence of Anshi was placed in the inner area, also held military rights, civil administration and financial power, was called Hanzhen. After that the number ranged from 40 to 50 and grew into an independent local power.

DOC.Title: Battle on the bank of the Taras
DOC.TEXT: Battle of the Tang Dynasty Takasaki was defeated by the Abbasid Muslim Islamic Army. Tang set back from the west area. This battle triggered the paper making process to Xishō.

DOC.Title: Takasago
DOC.TEXT: Tiger 's warrior from Goguryeo. Served in Genkyo, led the Tang Army in the battle on the bank of the Thalas, but was defeated by the Islamic army.

DOC.Title: Young Qi
DOC.TEXT: The love affair of Genji sect in later years. 745 year old became a prince (highest grade princess). Young Tadashi, who became the prime minister of the family, confronted Akki Mountain, caused a turbulence of Anshin, killed on his way to Sichuan.

DOC.Title: Anshin no Ran
DOC.TEXT: Ankara mountain father, historical thinking Mr. Rebellion centered on fathers. Anakuyama occupied Luoyang and Chang'an, self-naming the emperor of Daishin with respect to the throne. Genkyo abdicated while fleeing to Sichuan, Yang Guo-young was also killed. Tang suffered from the calming of the turbulence, competing against the reinforcement of moderation strength and Uyghur 's aid, and finally crushed down due to internal conflict on the rebellion side. After the turbulence, self-reliance of moderation degrees installed also in the country advanced, Tang's control power weakened.

DOC.Title: Ankuyama
DOC.TEXT: Born from Sogdo series. In line with Xuanju and Yang Qin-young, he is concurrently serving as a third-degree exercise for Pyeong-Lo, Fangyang, and Heping, and has captured the real power of Hebei. In opposition to the Prime Minister Yang Guozhou and rebelled in 755, he reigned in Luoyang in 756 and made the country name Otani, but was killed by a child Kei Kei.

DOC.Title: History thinking
DOC.TEXT: Born from Sogdo series. Subordinates of Ankuyama. After the death of Ankuyama, I fell into a Tang for a while but in 758 I rebelled again. It occupied Luoyang, killed Anji Kei, called Emperor Takayanagi, but was killed by the child 's historical morning justice.

DOC.Title: Uighur, Ring
DOC.TEXT: Turkish college nomads. In Turkistan it destroyed the East Street and founded the country. Boasting strong forces, such as assisting Tang with Ahn's turbulence, Tang suffered from its control.

DOC.Title: vigor
DOC.TEXT: A country established in the Tibetan Plateau. It became powerful in the 7th century and often invaded Tang. In the first half of the ninth century I had a meeting with Tang, although I had chased Chang'an temporarily by multiplying Ahn's turbulence. It broke down and faded around the middle of the 9th century.

DOC.Title: Clan Town
DOC.TEXT: In the second half of the Tang, a warlord chiefly serving as moderator in moderation. After the turbulence of Anshi, he held military, financial and civil governments of rural areas and became independent as a local power.

DOC.Title: Yangyu
DOC.TEXT: Early priest of the Tang Dynasty (ruling 779-805). We dedicated and promoted both tax laws in 780.

DOC.Title: Both tax laws
DOC.TEXT: Tax law implemented from the middle of the Tang dynasty to the late Ming Dynasty. After the turbulence of Anshin, Yang was devoted to Tokujong and was implemented in 780 to cope with the collapse of the Masuda and Tempo and the sharp decline in the revenue of the state treasuries due to independence of Hanzhen. Both taxes are nicknames because they were taxed twice in summer (June) and autumn (November). Depending on the land property at the place of residence, it was decided in principle that the payment was made in the form of payment, but there were also many payments by cereals and cloths.

DOC.Title: manor
DOC.TEXT: Originally it was the meaning of the villa and the rural area attached to it, but after the Tang Dynasty it was a large land operated by aristocrats and others. It developed after the Masuda government collapsed in the Tang Dynasty. Owners are emperor clans, nobles, bureaucrats, views of the temple (Taoist Temple), wealthy people, etc. The cultivators were peasants who are primarily called Shizukido since the middle of the Tang Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Wang Senghiba
DOC.TEXT: Shandong salt trader. He went to the capital in 874, destroyed after vandaling Northeast.

DOC.Title: Yellow nest
DOC.TEXT: Shandong salt trader. Although it took several times to test the examination, it fails, it is said that they gathered people who liked niche from defiance against Tang. In response to Wang Shishhiba, he was soldiers to the capital, occupying Chang'an and becoming the emperor, suicide by losing to Tang.

DOC.Title: Yellow Man's Random
DOC.TEXT: In response to the rebellion of Wang Seng, a large peasant rebellion at the end of the Tang Guided by the Yellow Nest. Background of tyranny and famine, civilians and crowds became the mainstay. The lambs are soldiers in Shandong, after the death of Wang Shishhiba, they absorbed their troops and vandalized all the borders except Sichuan, occupying Chang'an in 880 and making the nation equal to the throne. Although it was finally crushed by the military power of Hanzhen and his fellows, the manor was destroyed, the aristocrat fell, the dominion of the clan became independent, and the control of Tang virtually ended.

DOC.Title: Zhu Tadashi
DOC.TEXT: The referee captain of the yellow nest. After that, it fell into the Tang, played an active part in suppressing rebellion, and became Liang Wang in 901. In 907 he abolished the sorrow and destroyed the Tang.

DOC.Title: Chang'an
DOC.TEXT: City of Tang. It is near the current Xi'an in the center of Yezui Basin. Mandarin · New · Xi Wei · Northern Zhou · Yi · Tang Dynasty. In the heyday of Tang (Genki Genji) counted a population of one million, and prospered as the world's largest city with the capital Baghdad in Abbasid. The Tang 's Miyakonojo system became a model of neighboring countries, but it was destroyed by the turbulence of the end of the Tang.

DOC.Title: Luoyang
DOC.TEXT: Vice capital of Sui · Tang dynasty. In the case of Sui, it is called Toto and it is called Toto-Tokyo in Tang.

DOC.Title: City
DOC.TEXT: A place of commodity trading established in a certain area within the castle. We received restrictions on taxation, place, business hours etc for tax collection. Although it existed for a long time, East and West cities of Chang'an of Tang dynasty are famous. Since the middle of the Tang Dynasty, along with the development of commerce, the system of the city collapsed, a local trading place was born.

DOC.Title: Kusaichi
DOC.TEXT: A market opened outside the city wall. Meaning of a poorly unauthorized city. It originated from the end of the Tang and later developed into local cities such as town.

DOC.Title: Qian
DOC.TEXT: The remittance bill system in the second half of Tang. Along with the enforcement of both tax laws based on the development of remote area trade and payment in principle, it was born because of the inconvenient and difficult transportation of copper coins.

DOC.Title: Shi Shiji
DOC.TEXT: A government office that manages maritime trade in general. It was first installed in Guangzhou in the first half of the 8th century in the Genkyo era.

DOC.Title: Guangzhou
DOC.TEXT: Southern Guangdong Province, the port city downstream of the Pearl River. Arabic merchants arrived in the Tang Dynasty from the ancient times, and the first city shiji and Bamba (foreign merchant's settlement) were settled.

DOC.Title: Yangzhou
DOC.TEXT: Harbor City of Jiangsu Province. Along the Grand Canal it was located at a key point of land transportation. For the Tang dynasty prosperous with maritime trade, Arab merchants also stayed.

DOC.Title: Quanzhou
DOC.TEXT: Harbor City of Fujian Hongkong Province. An Arab merchant arrived in the Tang Dynasty and flourished in Nankai Trade.

DOC.Title: Arabs, Muslim merchants
DOC.TEXT: From the expansion of the Islamic area and the stability of the Tang arrived via the Nankai (Ocean Road), he was active in the Nankai Trade. In China, it was called "big food" (Taj).

DOC.Title: Sogged person
DOC.TEXT: Iranian ethnic groups in Sogdiana region in Central Asia. He played active role in the inland west-eastern trade and built many oasis cities. Many people came to Tang, also called "Hu people". It brought western religion and various cultures such as Zoroastrianism and Maniacism, making Tang culture rich in international characteristics.

DOC.Title: Tang poet
DOC.TEXT: A designation indicating the prosperity of the Tang Dynasty poetry. It became irrelevant along with the importance of the doctorate department which imposes poetry in the examination, occupying the central position of Tang Dynasty literature. The prosody such as rhythm / elimination was completed, and a unique poet gave out.

DOC.Title: Wang Fiber
DOC.TEXT: Sheng Tang's poet and painter. "Painting in poetry, with poetry in paintings", poetting natural beauty, painting Sanshui painting as a painter, later became "the father of the Namdong".

DOC.Title: Li-white
DOC.TEXT: Sheng Tang poet. The character is thick white. I served temporary Genkyo, but I sent most of my life in a wandering life. During the turbulence of Anshin, it became a temporary offense, mistaken for rebel army. Love drinking, poetry is a liberating freedom, it was called "Shisen".

DOC.Title: Du Fu
DOC.TEXT: Sheng Tang poet. I lived a lifetime out of life for a lifetime. Many works that sang reality of society such as "Harumi" and "Sold car line". Alongside Li Bai, it was regarded as the highest peak of the Chinese poet, and was later called "Poetry".

DOC.Title: White Irene, Shiraku-ten
DOC.TEXT: Poet and bureaucracy of Naka Tang. He sang the public's emotions with plain expressions. "Henge Su Song" who sang a tragic love of Genkyo and Yang Qin, and "Biwa line" are famous.

DOC.Title: Han Yu, Han Hyeon
DOC.TEXT: Scholar and writer of Nakaya Tang. One of the eight Tang Dynasty. Criticizing the 46th sentence of Six Dynasties, he advocated the reconstruction of the old text before Han. As scholars rejected Buddhism and Taoism, insisted on reconstruction of Confucianism.

DOC.Title: Yugen Maen
DOC.TEXT: A sentencer house of Naka Tang. One of the eight Tang Dynasty. With Han Yu, we came up with reconstruction of old writings.

DOC.Title: Yakeisho
DOC.TEXT: A painter of the first Tang. Excellent in portrait painting.

DOC.Title: Sansui Painting
DOC.TEXT: Painting with subjects of natural landscape as its theme, and incorporating its own view of nature. It is contrasted with a portrait / flower and bird painting. Origin is old, but we started to put water on the mountain in the Six Dynasties, and in the Tang Dynasty, the ink paintings of ink Mizuno were established.

DOC.Title: Kure Road
DOC.TEXT: Sheng Tang painter. He served Gen Xue. Draws people, Buddhist statues, Demonic Gods, Sansui, etc., and created a new technique to express volume feeling and stereoscopic effect with the thickness of the line.

DOC.Title: Li thinking
DOC.TEXT: Sheng Tang painter. He served Gen Xijing with the royal family of Tang. Excellent for Sanshui painting, there is a theory which is said to be "the ancestor of the North Poetry", but there is also an objection.

DOC.Title: Ou Yogou
DOC.TEXT: The first calligrapher of Sui Tang Dynasty. Excellent in the script, it is regarded as one of the three primary architects of the Tang Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Shaoyuan
DOC.TEXT: The first calligrapher of Sui Tang Dynasty. I served Tajong. It is regarded as one of the first three Turkish principals o

DOC.Title: Good Good
DOC.TEXT: The first calligrapher in Tang. He served Tajong · Takaju. Especially excelled in the scripture, it is regarded as one of the three primary documentaries of the Tang Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Facial Masato
DOC.TEXT: Sheng Tang calligrapher / politician. He led a volunteer army against the turbulence of Anshi and fought. After having appointed various officials, he went to persuasion by the rebel army and was killed. With a strong typhoon, we redesigned the elegant style of writing since Wang Feng Yi and opened a new style of writing in the scripts and scripts.

DOC.Title: Tang Sancha
DOC.TEXT: Pottery of the Tang Dynasty with coloring such as green, brown and white. Many people such as people, animals, and appliances were used as burial goods.

DOC.Title: "Tea ceremony"
DOC.TEXT: A book by Tang Lu Feather. It describes the origin and production area of ​​tea, the tea making method, the method of drinking tea etc. It is considered as the classic of the tea ceremony.

DOC.Title: Hole Piercing
DOC.TEXT: The first Confucian scholar in Tang. He served Tajong, compiled "Suizo", "Masayoshi Mikoshi" and others.

DOC.Title: Ancestor
DOC.TEXT: Tang first scholar. I participated in the compilation of "Goma Masayoshi".

DOC.Title: "Masayoshi Oshima"
DOC.TEXT: Annotation written by. A facial teacher made a stamp of the god of madness, based on which the pitiful et al. Edited by the imperial author of the Tajong. 223 volumes. As a result, since the interpretation of Goshiki was unified and it was regarded as the text of the examination, the Confucianism was fixed and formalized.

DOC.Title: Tendai sect
DOC.TEXT: A faction of Buddhism who values ​​the Lotus Sutra and attempts to unify the doctrines of various denominations. Founder of Sui 's wisdom father, I came to Tang Dynasty era. Teruya reported to Japan.

DOC.Title: Shingon sect
DOC.TEXT: A faction of Buddhism centered on the Dainichi Faith which was introduced from India in the middle Tang dynasty. It has a strong magical tendency, also called esotopism. Kukai reported to Japan.

DOC.Title: Zen sect
DOC.TEXT: A faction of Buddism that emphasizes practice by zazen and meditation. Indian monk police who came to Northern Wei on Friday will be founded. Born in Tang Dynasty, the Song Dynasty was believed mainly in the Daio Ohio class, became the mainstream of Chinese Buddhism.

DOC.Title: Jodo sect
DOC.TEXT: Amida Pure Land Buddhist faction preaching faith. In China it is commonly called Honjo. Tohno 's devotion became the founder of the Tang Dynasty (613-681) was established. After the Song Dynasty, it spread among the people, became the mainstream of Chinese Buddhism with Zen sect.

DOC.Title: Gen Xu, Mr. Sanzo
DOC.TEXT: Tang priest. 629 I committed an arms race and departed from Chang'an alone, and went to India via the western territory. After having received the hospitality of King Harsha, after studying at the Norander monastery for 5 years, we went overland, overseas, returned to the land over the land in 645 with many scriptures and Buddhist statues. After returning home, we tried to translate the Buddhist scripture into Chinese, and opened the Jūmyo priest. He wrote "The Great Tang West Region".

DOC.Title: "Great Tang West Region"
DOC.TEXT: Travelogue of Xuan. The disciple compiled it and was completed in 646. Volume 12. It is regarded as an important historical material for research on Indian-Western regional circumstances.

DOC.Title: Yoshiaki
DOC.TEXT: Tang priest. Departing from Guangzhou in 671, he entered the sea route India, studied at the Norander monastery, surrounded Buddhas marks of various places, returned to Japan in 695 after passing through Nankai countries. After returning home, the Buddhist scripture translated into Chinese translated into 230 volumes. "Great Tang Western Region Traffic High School Teacher" 2 volumes, "Nankai Paradise Inner Law" 4 volumes.

DOC.Title: "Nankai Paradise Inner Law"
DOC.TEXT: Travel memorandum of India / Nankai of Yoshiyoshi. Volume 4. It is described in Shreevijaya who stayed home from India and is regarded as an important historical study of Indian history, Nankai history and Buddhist history.

DOC.Title: 祆 教
DOC.TEXT: The Chinese name of Zoroastrianism. It was reported by Western people around the time of Northern Wei. In Tang Dynasty (Temple and Temple) was built in various places and was popular. It was banned in Kashchang 's Wasted Buddha (845) and declined.

DOC.Title: Maniacism
DOC.TEXT: It arrived from the western region at the end of the 7th century, and in the 8th century a temple was built such as Chang'an. It spread among Uighurs and was regarded as state religion. It was banned by the abandoned Buddha of Kanchang and it faded.

DOC.Title: landscape
DOC.TEXT: Nestorian Christian Chinese name. Iranian book of Iran came to morning in 635 and was allowed to propagate. Wangsa Temple (renamed Daitsu Temple in 745) was built in various places, but it was banned and declined in Kashchang's abolished Buddha.

DOC.Title: Otsuki Jingyocho fashionable Chinese monument
DOC.TEXT: In the year of Tokugo in 781, a monument built in Dajin Temple in Chang'an, praising the fashionable landscape. Using Kanji and Syriac letters, the outline of the Doctrine Doctrine and the origins of origin are written. It was discovered in the end.

DOC.Title: Episcopion
DOC.TEXT: Islamic Chinese name. Even times are written as Queen Mandarin. In the late 7th century Taojong, Arabs told through the sea route, a temple was built in the port city of South China. After entering the northeastern part of China after going through the western territory of the land route.

DOC.Title: Abenakaro
DOC.TEXT: As an international student from Japan, he entered. He was heavily used by Emperor Xuan and served as Anseong Moderator, and also met with Li Qi and Wang Feng.

DOC.Title: East Asian cultural sphere
DOC.TEXT: A world that has its own cultural features such as kanji, Confucianism, Buddhism, mainly in China, including the Korean Peninsula, Japan, and the northern part of Vietnam. Tang culture influenced the whole East Asia, a vast cultural area was established.

DOC.Title: Binding system
DOC.TEXT: An international order formed by China connecting formal Kimishi relations based on neighboring countries and Confucian Chinese ideas. I decided to establish one diplomatic order in East Asia by giving the head of the morning tributary in Han / Tang etc, to give a throne and approving its governance (booklet). In a country that only wants trade, it allowed trade by the morning style.

DOC.Title: Ventricular ___
DOC.TEXT: A nation that was established around the Qinghai Shrine. It is said to be a kingdom of the fresh base who dominated Tibetan indigenous people. In 635 I was assigned to Tang, 663 I was singled, I recovered afterwards, but it did not succeed and dispersed.

DOC.Title: vigor
DOC.TEXT: The Kingdom established in Tibet (nomenclature from the Chinese side). Sonzhen Gambo unified the Tibetan tribes and founded them. The capital is Lhasa. Since Tajong continued friendship with Tang, but eventually conflicted, occupied Chang'an one hour after Anshi's disorder. In the beginning of the 9th century I met with Tang, but declined in internal conflict.

DOC.Title: Lhasa
DOC.TEXT: City of spite. It is located in the main part of the coastal area of ​​the Yaltzempo river tributary and was the center of religion, politics, economics and culture of Tibet for a long time. In the 17th century the Potala Palace, the center of Tibetan Buddhism and politics, was built.

DOC.Title: Sonchen = Gumpo
DOC.TEXT: A founder of the victim. Expanding the area with Lhasa as the capital, culturally adopting both Tang and Indian cultures actively adopted Tibetan letters.

DOC.Title: Tibetan character
DOC.TEXT: Soncheng = Gampo made characters based on Indian characters. Gupta letters are presumed to be original patterns. It is a left-handed horizontal phonetic character, consisting of consonant characters 30 and vowel symbols 4.

DOC.Title: Tibetan Buddhism, Lamma
DOC.TEXT: Mahayana Buddhism flowed from China and India in the 7th and 8th centuries and Bonnism inherent in Tibet are fused and Buddhism unique to Tibet established in the 8th and 9th centuries. It became a national religion of vigor, but it declined temporarily due to the late Buddha of the end. Rebuilt in the 11th century, factions were established by the end of the 13th century. The Tibetan Buddhist sutra of Nemoto sutra was completed after the 13th century. Since Tsunkapa established a hat school in the 14th century, the former sect is called a red hat. Lama is a superior and mentor, and it is a word originally referring to Tibetan Buddhist monk.

DOC.Title: Minami
DOC.TEXT: The Kingdom of the Lolo tribe of the Tibetan-Burmese system which was established around the Yunnan Dali. The decree is the meaning of the king. Keeping friendship with Tang, unified the Yunnan province in the first half of the 8th century. It flourished between Tang and Vietnam, reaching its peak in the 8th and 9th centuries. We adopted Tang culture, publicize Kanji and encouraged Buddhism. Early in the 10th century, the country was taken away by the Chinese Heritage Premier and was destroyed.

DOC.Title: Dali
DOC.TEXT: A country the white barbarian clan was built in Yunnan. Although I joined the Song, it was conquered by the Mongolian Fubylai and decreased.

DOC.Title: Shin, Cambodia
DOC.TEXT: The Chinese name of the country that the Khmer people of the Indochina peninsula built. It was founded in the 6th century, and in the 7th century it joined Fenan. It split in the 8th century, but it was reunited under the encore morning in the 9th century. It was a tribute to Tang.

DOC.Title: Champa, Hayashie
DOC.TEXT: The Kingdom of the Cham people in the southern part of Vietnam. Lin-eup is the Chinese name. About 192, it became independent from the latter Han, flourished by maritime trade. Although it rebelled against Sui, it was a tribute to Tang.

DOC.Title: Sully Vijaya, Muiyasu Buddha death
DOC.TEXT: A kingdom centered on the eastern part of Sumatra. It was a tribute to Tang.

DOC.Title: Koguryo
DOC.TEXT: A country of Tungus family ancestry occurred in the southeastern part of northeastern China. In the beginning of the 4th century destroyed Yamagi gun and possessed North Korea. After that, it transferred to Pyongyang and pressured Baekje · Shilla. In the 7th century it repulsed the Sui Tang Army, but in 668 the Tang Shilla Allied army destroyed.

DOC.Title: 靺鞨 人
DOC.TEXT: Tungus-type ethnic group who lived in the Songhua River basin in northeastern China. Some entered under the rule of Koguryo, but after the destruction of Goguryo, in 698 Bohai province was built.

DOC.Title: 大 祚 栄
DOC.TEXT: Founder of Balhae country (rank 698-719). People (there is also a theory to make it a religion of Goguryeo). I lost control of the Tang, led the people of Goguryeo and the people, moved to the eastern part of the Tohoku region, and built the 698 Earthquake. It was sealed by King Balhae County from Tang 713.

DOC.Title: Bohai country
DOC.TEXT: A country made up of the people of God and Goguryeo, built by Daisuke. It dominated Primoryeo and North Korea mainly in the eastern part of China Tohoku region. Together with the tongue, ingesting its institutions and cultures, Buddhism was also scrambled and called "prosperity of the sea." The city of Tokyo (Ryugaku Kamigyo) which imitated Chang'an. I talked with Japan as a lady. In the first half of the 10th century, it was destroyed by Zhitan's Zaya Aki.

DOC.Title: "Kaigoku no Kokoku"
DOC.TEXT: Another name for Balhae country which dates back to the 9th century.

DOC.Title: Ryugaku Kamigyo
DOC.TEXT: City of Bohai. It was built following the Miyakonojo system of Tang Anjo. Current China Heilongjiang Province Ning An County Tokyo Castle.

DOC.Title: Shilla
DOC.TEXT: In the seventh century it tied with the Tang to destroy the Baekje · Goguryeo, destroyed the Tang in 676 and unified the majority of the Korean Peninsula. Following the Tang 's book seal, he took Tang' s cultures and institutions such as Linguistic Order and Buddhism culture. In the first half of the 10th century, it was destroyed by Koryo.

DOC.Title: Gyeongju
DOC.TEXT: City of Silla. Former name Kinjo. The current city of Gyeongsangbuk-do. Many ruins that convey Buddhism culture of Silla, such as Bulguksa Temple, Cave Town ancestry, ancient burial mounds and Wanglong.

DOC.Title: Bulguksa Temple
DOC.TEXT: A typical Buddhist temple in the Silla period, remaining in southeastern Gyeongju. It was built in the first half of the sixth century and expanded extensively in the middle of the 8th century. Afterwards, I had encountered warfare and lost wooden building parts, but the stone mulching tower that remains now is regarded as a worldwide masterpiece.

DOC.Title: Cave Town
DOC.TEXT: A cave temple in the suburbs of Gyeongju. It was built in 751. The reliefs such as Buddha Buddha statue of Buddha and Buddhist temple Bodhisattva are regarded as masterpieces of Shilla's Buddhist art.

DOC.Title: Bone parts system
DOC.TEXT: Shilla 's privileged status system. Distinguished in five stages by family from the country of origin, regulated the ranking, government work, marriage, etc.

DOC.Title: Baekje
DOC.TEXT: A country where the horse-korea in the southwestern part of the Korean Peninsula was unified and built. The capital was transferred to Han Castle, later Kumitsu and Husband. I communicated Buddhism to Japan. The Japanese army destroyed by Tang Shilla and came to rescue was defeated in 663 by the fight of Shiramura River.

DOC.Title: Asuka era
DOC.TEXT: The metropolis was in Asuka (now Nara prefecture Takaichi gun Asuka village), the period from the end of the 6th century to the mid-7th century of Japan.

DOC.Title: Prince Shota child
DOC.TEXT: In 593, it became regent of Emperor Suiko, promoted the rise of Buddhism, the dispatch of sending envoys, the enactment of Article 17 of the Constitution, etc.

DOC.Title: Birthday ___
DOC.TEXT: The envoy that Prince Shotoku dispatched to the Sui. It was dispatched four times in about 600 years, 607 years, 608 years, 614 years.

DOC.Title: Ono sister
DOC.TEXT: I went to Sui as a wiping expedition twice in 607-608 and 608-609. In 607 he submitted to the Emperor a national letter showing a position of equal diplomacy.

DOC.Title: Tang Dynasty
DOC.TEXT: The delegation dispatched from Japan to Tang during the Nara / Heian period. It began in 630 and was carried out 16 times until the abolition of 894. International students and exchange students were also dispatched together and contributed to the import of Tang culture.

DOC.Title: Taika Reforms
DOC.TEXT: Sogaki in 645 Mr. Soga begins to overthrow Japanese ancient political reform. Promoting public citizens · Professor Shigeta · taxonomy system etc. with the aim of establishing a centrally centralized system centered on the Emperor, with the cooperation of the Chief Cabinet Secretary Konoko and Kamishinamakamidoka. did.

DOC.Title: Battle of Shiramura River
DOC.TEXT: The battle that the Japanese navy who dispatched for Baekje relief was defeated by Tang Shilla's water army in Shiramura River in the Jinjiang mouth of Korea. The Japanese forces were swept away from the Korean Peninsula.

DOC.Title: National Organization of the Order
DOC.TEXT: The centralized political system of Japan, following the Tang rule. It was completed at the time of Taisei Ruling of 701 from Taika 's reform.

DOC.Title: Hakuho culture
DOC.TEXT: In the latter half of the 7th century, the culture of the Hakuho era from the revolution of Daifuku to the transition capital of Heijo-kyo. Tang culture was directly imported. Besides Buddhist art, literature and academic progress have also progressed, showing the transitional character from Asuka to Tenpyo.

DOC.Title: Nara era
DOC.TEXT: The era when the capital was built in Nara. After the era of Nagaokakyo from 784 to 794 it leads to the Heian period. Tianpyeong culture flourished, the national regime was prepared.

DOC.Title: Heijo-kyo
DOC.TEXT: City of 710 to 784 years. Following the Changan of Tang, it was built in a slightly reduced scale.

DOC.Title: Tenpyo Culture
DOC.TEXT: Culture of the Nara period centered on the Tenpyo period of Emperor Shomu in the 8th century. It is an internationally rich culture influenced by the cultures of Tang and continents, reflecting the heyday of the nation's state, a noble and Buddhist element.

DOC.Title: Five generations
DOC.TEXT: From the destruction of the Tang to the formation of the Song, the five dynasties of Beijeong, Tang Dynasty, Jin Shin, Later Han, and Latter Zhou, who rushed to the North China. Although it was politically unstable by the war caused by armed politics and the activities of northern foreigners, economically the emerging landowner and rich traders emerged, industrial development was seen, the prosperity of Song Dynasty prosperity A foundation was created.

DOC.Title: Fifth ten countries
DOC.TEXT: Countries that came to rise during the period from the destruction of Tang to the unification of China in Song. The five dynasties of North China and the 10 countries of Gyeongnam, South China, Wuqiao, Jinan, Chung, South Han and North Han in the South China neighborhood.

DOC.Title: Clan Town
DOC.TEXT: After Tang, it refers to a warlord whose main strength is moderation. After the turbulence of Anshi, he held the three powers of military, fiscal and civil affairs and became an independent regional power. The number was 40 to 50 at the end of the Tang and 30 to 40 at the 5th. Founding founder of five generations of ten countries has many clan leaders.

DOC.Title: moderation use
DOC.TEXT: In the end of the Tang Dynasty, military service of synonyms with Hanzhen.

DOC.Title: Zhu Tadashi
DOC.TEXT: The first Emperor of the Rear Beam (Division 907-912). Participated in the turbulence of the yellow nest, descended into the Tang, became moderation, destroyed the Tang and founded the Rear Beam. He fought violently against other moderation and was killed by his second baby.

DOC.Title: Rear Beam
DOC.TEXT: The first dynasty of Five Era that Zhu Tadada established. Chenzhou is opened. In 2 generations it was reduced to Tang Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Later Tang
DOC.TEXT: The dynasty where Lee Lee 勗 (an ancestor, borough, Zuusong) built the country after destroying the back beam. The capital is Luoyang. It was destroyed by Shin Jin in 4th generation.

DOC.Title: Later Jin
DOC.TEXT: The dynasty after Tang Dynasty Stone Taketomi (an ancestor, from the high-ranking) was founded under the aid of Kotan. The capital is opened. He took a priest (giving his age of prejudice) to Kuritan, and ceded Yan Yun Closing six provinces. It was destroyed by Kotan in 2 generations.

DOC.Title: Yan Yun Cheng 6 province
DOC.TEXT: In the area of ​​part of Hebei / Shanxi that we ceded in 936 as a compensation for the aftershin stone keeper's assistance by Kotan. Sejong of the late Zhou, Song Tao and Taejong and others were recaptured, but they did not succeed.

DOC.Title: Han Han
DOC.TEXT: Dynasty's moderation Dynasty dynasty Dynasty dynasty (originating from the suicide, high-ancestor) was founded dynasty. The capital is opened (Daebei). In 2 generations he was destroyed by Guo.

DOC.Title: lap week
DOC.TEXT: The dynasty which the modernity moderator of the latter Han Dynasty (Taician) was founded under his subordinates. The capital is opened. 2 Genji sect was regarded as one of the five generations, endeavored to stabilize domestic politics, such as by establishing finances by forcibly abolishing the Buddha, destroyed Kutan outside the country and recaptured part of the six provinces. He was knocked down by Song for three generations.

DOC.Title: Military politics
DOC.TEXT: A tyranny (clanweight) faction, typically found in the administration of Five generations, is an arbitrary political power with armed force.

DOC.Title: Song
DOC.TEXT: With the confusion of about 200 years since Ahn's disorder, the unified dynasty of China. The state that the warrior forces of the 5th generation of the Tang dynasty was conquered and settled the monarchy dictatorship system. It is divided into the Northern Song Dynasty and the Southern Song Dynasty. There is also the theory that Declination of the South Song is 1276 when fallout has fallen.

DOC.Title: North Song
DOC.TEXT: Song dynasty from the founding state by Zhao Zheng to the 9th Kinjong. The capital is opened. While adopting bureaucracy with bureaucracy adopted biblicalism, established a monarchy system, but suffered from financial difficulties due to pressure of Liao, Nishi Xia, gold of the northern ethnic groups. It was destroyed by money due to Yasutaka 's strange.

DOC.Title: Zhao Zheng, Ta Ta
DOC.TEXT: The first Emperor of Song (ranking 960 to 976). Warlord of the late Zhou. He was prompted by his subordinates and throne, succeeding the policies of Zeonjong in the latter period, and tried to reform the various systems. In particular, it strengthened the forbidden army by suppressing the faction of Hanzhen (warrior), promoted bunraku politics, established the foundation of the centralized system of monarchy dictatorship.

DOC.Title: opening, 汴 京
DOC.TEXT: Cities in Henan Province. Five generations (excluding Tang Dynasty) · City of North Song Dynasty. It was a meeting place of the Grand Canal that connects Huanghe River and Huai River, developed as the center of transportation and commerce.

DOC.Title: "Chiaki Uekawa chart"
DOC.TEXT: Picture scrolls that will be made at the end of North Song, Zhang Select. It is depicting the bustle of opening of the day of "Chiming clause" on the 15th day from the day of the vernal equinox.

DOC.Title: Taejong
DOC.TEXT: The second Emperor of the North Song (ranking 976-997). After fulfilling the reign of King Otodo, after 976, he destroyed North Han, completed the reunification of China, and tried to establish the literaryism.

DOC.Title: Civilizationism
DOC.TEXT: It is also a literary politics, a term for martial arts and warrior politics. A policy aimed at governance by educated literary bureaucrats, reforming the martial arts of the founder and the moderator of the end of the Tang Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Completion
DOC.TEXT: Official appointment system that started in Sui · Tang and completed in Song Dynasty. In the Song Dynasty, a three-step system of provincial examination, provincial testimonials and festival examination was established, and the top candidates of the testimonial were appointed high-level bureaucrats and strengthened the monarchy dictatorship.

DOC.Title: state test, solution test
DOC.TEXT: Regional exam conducted as the first stage of Song's enumeration.

DOC.Title: saving
DOC.TEXT: As a second step of the Song 's enumeration, an exam conducted at the central ceremony section for the state bad guard.

DOC.Title: Kamiishi
DOC.TEXT: Final exam of Song 's examination. Taic was founded. Examination that the emperor himself enforces against the provincial battle crowd. The successful applicant pledged loyalty as emperor 's subordinate and was given the way to high-level bureaucrats.

DOC.Title: squirrel
DOC.TEXT: One of the subjects of the examination. The poetry talent was questioned. In the middle term of Northern Song, the examinations were unitized in the department of doctor course together with both excellent and morning classes. In addition, the person who passed the examination itself is called a doctor.

DOC.Title: Reader
DOC.TEXT: The meaning of academics / intellectuals.

DOC.Title: Mr. Otao
DOC.TEXT: After Song Dynasty, it refers to social ruling class with Confucian culture. In society, he had a side to readers to agricultural and industry, economically the emerging landowner, politically as a person who passed the examination.

DOC.Title: Forbidden army
DOC.TEXT: Originally refers to the emperor's guards. In Song, it means regular army, it was stationed around the capital city.

DOC.Title: About the sum of the Keio calendar
DOC.TEXT: Peace treaty between Song and Xia Xia. Song decided to give silver, silk and tea as a gift for the summer in the western summer.

DOC.Title: Shin sect
DOC.TEXT: The sixth Emperor of the North Song (ranking 1067 ~ 85). In order to overcome the fiscal collapse such as expenses such as military expenses and age spending, expenses increase due to the increase of bureaucracy, we have appointed Wang Taishi to implement the new law and also reformed the government system.

DOC.Title: Wang Taishi
DOC.TEXT: Politician and writer of North Song. One of the eight Tang Dynasty. Received the trust of the priest, became the chairmen of 1070 and implemented the new law. In response to the opposition from the old party party, he resigned from the Prime Minister in 1976.

DOC.Title: Prime Minister
DOC.TEXT: A position to assist the emperor as the government's chief executive. 1 to 3 people.

DOC.Title: New Law
DOC.TEXT: Policies of the Fukoku Militia that Wang Taishishi took in order to overcome the military and fiscal crisis of Song. Because it restrained the interests of landowners and Tosho and privileged bureaucrats, the conservative legislative party strongly opposed and did not succeed due to incompleteness and mismatch in practice.

DOC.Title: Aomi Satake Act
DOC.TEXT: A policy that the government lends money and money to small farmers with low interest and repays it at harvest. We aimed for relief of small farmers suffering from the owner's lending, aiming at increasing government revenue. It was against the landowner.

DOC.Title: Equal import method
DOC.TEXT: The government buys up special products of various places and resells it in the scarce place. Although it helped the stability and distribution of prices, it was strongly opposed as depriving the profits from intermediate exploitation of large merchants.

DOC.Title: City law law
DOC.TEXT: Policies to buy this by the government when medium-sized merchants' stocks can not be sold or to make low-interest loans of 20% per year by mortgaging their supplies. It aimed at restricting price manipulation by large merchants, price adjustment and protection of small and medium-sized merchants.

DOC.Title: Recruitment Law
DOC.TEXT: Policy called political difference called role of collecting immigration money instead of exempting labor service such as tax collection / security maintenance, and recruiting those who desire difference as employment. Traditionally, from the perspective of the government and the temple where the privilege of the immigration was held, the assistant money was collected and applied to the financial resources of employment.

DOC.Title: Strength method
DOC.TEXT: A soldiers' measure against a soldier agriculture instead of a mercenary system. Maintained 10 households of the civilian population, 50 houses major, and 500 families as the municipal government to keep security. In addition, military training was given during the agricultural off-season to train militias.

DOC.Title: Homma law
DOC.TEXT: Policy to compensate for the shortage of war horse. Granted the government a horse horse and a price for the private sector, allowed to use as an agricultural horse in peacetime, as a war horse in wartime.

DOC.Title: Average tax law
DOC.TEXT: I applied fairness to the land by rating its good or bad, and imposed a fair by imposing a tax amount accordingly.

DOC.Title: New Party Party
DOC.TEXT: Bureaucrats who support the new law of Wangan stone. Many were from Gangnam, and were in charge of the administration during the era of Sotobu and Himeji.

DOC.Title: Former law party
DOC.TEXT: Conservative bureaucracy who opposed the new law. There were many people from the large landowners and large merchants of Shiba Gaite North China, and there were many Confucius scholars.

DOC.Title: Shiba Hikaru
DOC.TEXT: Politician and historian of North Song Dynasty. The central figure of the former law party. In 1086 he became the prime minister of the emperor Tetsugemasa, abolished the new law and revived the old law. I compiled the "Tunnel Guide".

DOC.Title: Hujong
DOC.TEXT: The eighth Emperor of the Northern Song (ranking 1100-25). A child of the god of religion. Adopted the new law, politicians leave it to the vassal, and himself sent a luxurious life as "Feng Tian Tian". In an alliance with gold and pinched Liao, after 1125 the capital was attacked by the gold troops and it succumbed to Kimon. In 26 years after being attacked again by gold, he caught the following year and was sick in the land of gold.

DOC.Title: Kinjong
DOC.TEXT: The ninth son of the ninth son emperor (rank 1125-27). He reigned at the time of the opening attack of the Golden Army, reconciled with gold, but again attacked, took him to the North in 1127, and was sick in the gold land.

DOC.Title: Yasushi's funny
DOC.TEXT: Kim who was allied with Song and destroyed Liao, occupied the opening in 1126, accusing the penalty of Song, and in 2001 captured Huang sect, Kinjong, Queen, royal family, aristocrats and took him to the north. As a result, North Song Dynasty has been destroyed.

DOC.Title: South Song
DOC.TEXT: Song dynasty rebuilt by Takajong who flew to Gangnam due to Yasutaka's strange. Miyako is late (Hangzhou). The various systems succeeded the Northern Song. Economically developed in Gangnam development, suffered from countermeasures against the north, in 1279, was destroyed by the original Fabylai. There is also a theory that 1276 when fallout fell was a year of destruction.

DOC.Title: Takaji
DOC.TEXT: The first Emperor of the South Song (President 1127 ~ 62). A child of Hojong. I escaped Yakuza's strange and rebuilt Song in Gangnam. Later security was taken as the capital. Outwardly, it supported the peace faction and kept the main faction back. In 1142, we thanked our father for gold, and with Huai River as the border, we signed a humiliating sum of annual awards (250,000 silver and 250,000 silk) a year.

DOC.Title: Lin'an, Hangzhou
DOC.TEXT: The port city of Zhejiang province. Since 1138, it became the capital of Southern Song, prospering as the center of economic and cultural. In the original era Marco Polo et al. Introduced the prosperity.

DOC.Title: Suzhou
DOC.TEXT: A commercial and industrial city located in Jiangsu Province. In contact with the Grand Canal, as a Song Dynasty, as a hand-made city of silk and cotton fabrics, it prosper prosperous after breaking and security.

DOC.Title: Yuki Fei
DOC.TEXT: Warlord of the South Song. As the center of the main battle, we insisted against the fight against gold, but it was captured by Qin Hin and died in prison. It was made a posthumous, ethnical hero.

DOC.Title: Qin Hin
DOC.TEXT: Politician of Southern Song. The central character of the peace school. It was taken to gold by Yasutaka 's strange. After being permitted and returning to Japan, he became a minister in 1131, promoted the peace with gold, and concluded a 42-year talks. However, it was regarded as a salesman in later life.

DOC.Title: Huaihe River, Huifu Water
DOC.TEXT: A river that flows eastward from the southern tip of Henan Province and pours into the Yellow Sea. It forms the boundary between the native upland field of North China and the paddy field of Gangnam. In 1142, the line connecting Huaihe River and Qinling was the boundary between South Song and Gold.

DOC.Title: Governor
DOC.TEXT: In Sui · Tang, it refers to government-owned people. After the Song Dynasty, a house that handed out bureaucrats who passed the examination. Kobo is clearly stipulated in family register, privileges such as reduction and exemption of role are granted only in one generation.

DOC.Title: Moment door
DOC.TEXT: Emerging landowner who emerged in Song Dynasty. Since it brought out a lot of bureaucrats, it was also called a magazine door, which formed the ruler of Song Dynasty society.

DOC.Title: Suidobade
DOC.TEXT: A peasant farmer. In the Song Dynasty it is a cultivator of a bureaucrat or a manor of a royal family. Although it was legally free people, others were oppressed by landlords economically and deprived of freedom of relocation. About half of the harvest was delivered to landowners as rent.

DOC.Title: Yuida
DOC.TEXT: Water rice fields reclaimed by embankment of wetlands etc. It was created by government offices, temples, etc. mainly in the downstream of the Yangtze River, and the cultivated land was expanded greatly.

DOC.Title: Putian
DOC.TEXT: One of the Kuroda. Cultivated land reclaiming river banks and ponds. There were also large-scale items surrounded by dozens of embankments.

DOC.Title: Koda
DOC.TEXT: One of the Kuroda. A part of the lake was surrounded by a levee, and the inside was made a rice field. It developed in Jiangsu and Zhejiang province where there are many lakes.

DOC.Title: Oriented rice field
DOC.TEXT: In the northern Song Dynasty, rice cultivated strongly in early morning, which was introduced from fortresses (chimpers in Vietnam). It spread to the paddy field of the Yangtze River basin.

DOC.Title: "Su Lake mature if it matures well", "Jiang Zhe ripe if you mature enough"
DOC.TEXT: Su is the abbreviation for Suzhou and the lake is for Huzhou, a word indicating that rice cultivation in the lower Yagawa River basin from the middle stage of Song has become the center of Chinese agriculture. "Jiang Zhe" stands for Jiangsu and Zhejiang.

DOC.Title: Kusaichi
DOC.TEXT: A trade fair born spontaneously outside the castle in the state province. It was built in the area of ​​amphibious traffic, the gate of a temple, etc., and some developed into towns and cities.

DOC.Title: Town
DOC.TEXT: A small town in rural areas that was developed by the development of commerce and industry in Song Dynasty. Many developed from the grass city.

DOC.Title: alternation
DOC.TEXT: The world's first bill. It evolved from the change since the Tang. The government took over the bills issued by private financial institutions in Chengdu in Sichuan during the Northern Song Dynasty and issued it as bank notes.

DOC.Title: Association
DOC.TEXT: Banknote in the south song. In the Northern Song Dynasty, the government issued bills issued by financial clubs in big cities, in the southern Song, the government issued bills. Afterwards it was overwhelmed and confused the economy.

DOC.Title: Coin, Song Sen
DOC.TEXT: Along with the development of the commercial and industrial industry of Song Dynasty, a large amount of copper money was cast with Tang 's open money as the parade. It leaked out of the country under the name of Song Qian, and it was also brought to Japan and circulated.

DOC.Title: line
DOC.TEXT: In Sui · Tang, it means a same-shopping street permitted to operate in the city. In Song is a merchant association formed by a businessman in monopoly of sales and for mutual aid.

DOC.Title: work
DOC.TEXT: The same association union of craftsmen. After Song, cooperatives were formed for each type of industry with the development of handicraft industry, mutual assistance was made.

DOC.Title: Shi Shiji
DOC.TEXT: Office responsible for the affairs of maritime trade relations. It was installed in Guangzhou for the first time in Tang, it was maintained in Song, was installed in Quanzhou, Wenzhou, Mingzhou, Hangzhou, Shuzhou, Mizzhou etc.

DOC.Title: Nankai Trade
DOC.TEXT: Trade with China and South China Sea-Indian Ocean countries. A Muslim merchant arrived in the Tang Dynasty, and a Chinese merchant joined the Song Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Mingzhou, Ningbo
DOC.TEXT: Harbor city in eastern Zhejiang Province. In addition to trade with Japan, the Sung Dynasties prospered even in Nankai Trade. It is also known as a school of Zen priests from Japan. Ningbo is a designation after Ming Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Guangzhou
DOC.TEXT: Harbor city downstream of Pearl River in Guangdong province. Many Muslim merchants arrived, and it was the largest trade port in Northern Song. In Southern Song, Quanzhou was robbed of prosperity.

DOC.Title: Quanzhou
DOC.TEXT: Port city in southeast of Fujian Province. Prosperous in foreign trade, city shiji was set up in Northern Song. In the Southern Song Dynasty, the amount of trade surpassed Guangzhou and counted the population of 500,000. Many foreigners, including Arabs, arrived and were later introduced to the west by the name of Zeiton by Marco Po.

DOC.Title: Jingdezhen
DOC.TEXT: China's first ceramic ceramic city in northern part of Jiangxi province. After the Tang Dynasty especially developed after the Song Dynasty became world famous.

DOC.Title: Diffusion of coffee
DOC.TEXT: Habit of drinking tea was transmitted to Han Chinese Sichuan, spreading to Gangnam during the Jin · North · Northeast Morning era. It spread to Guangxi and Shaanxi during the Sui · Tang period, spreading to the public in the middle of the Tang Dynasty. In the Song Dynasty, it spreads to domestic as well as neighboring ethnic groups, and monopoly of tea was also carried out.

DOC.Title: Song University
DOC.TEXT: New Confucianism established in Song Dynasty. Since Confucianism was "Tadashi Masayoshi" since the Tang Dynasty, we opposed the situation that remained in lecture studies, explored the new view of the universe, developed a new thought system of practical ethics from the standpoint of the reasoning theory. Beginning at the Zhou Dynasty in Northern Song Dynasty, it was inherited to the Summer Brothers and was broken up by Zhu Xi of South Song Dynasty, so it is also called Zhuzhi / Zhuzhi University or Physics / Sex Science. In addition, Lu Jiuchu of the South Song is opposed to dualism, bringing up the monism of "imitation of the mind", leading to Ming Dynasty 's yuanmaku, but there is also the theory that this school of Lujinyu is included in Song Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Zhou Jun Summer
DOC.TEXT: Confucian of Northern Song. While introducing Doi House thought and Buddhist philosophy (Zen sect), based on the theory of space philosophy the moral theory based on easy and moderate. It was supposed to be the founder of Song Dynasty by Zhu Shi. Book "Taiyo Dictionary".

DOC.Title: degree 顥
DOC.TEXT: Confucian scholar in North Song. The issue is Ming. My brother is about half the length. Together with "a degree". Together learned from Zhou Zhuang, named the fundamental principle of the universe theory and preached to grasp this by the original human mind. He took charge of bureaucracy, but opposed the new law of Wang'an stone.

DOC.Title: About Title
DOC.TEXT: Confucian of Northern Song. Isagawa is Ikawa. About a younger brother. I developed a theory of my older brother, given a reasoning of dualism to preach the coincidence of reason and mind (principle of substance formation), and had a great influence on the completion of Zhuzhi.

DOC.Title: Zhu Xi, Zhuzi
DOC.TEXT: Confuciusist of South Song. Concerning the four books as the fundamental scripture of Confucianism, he comprehended Song dynasty by synthesizing the doctrine of Zhuang Dynasty, Zhang Jian, "Near" (degree) and others. I explained the theory of cosmology (thoroughly understanding things of things, completing knowledge of minutes), reasoning theory, sexual theory, theory of justice. Main article "collection of four books" "guidelines for junior high school students".

DOC.Title: Zu school student
DOC.TEXT: Zhu Xi's Taisei study. Because it was also the culmination of the scholarship of Song Dynasty, there are things sometimes called "Song University".

DOC.Title: Four books
DOC.TEXT: Four books of "university" "medium" "thesis" "Mencius". Zhu Shi called the four books and wrote "Four books collection" and appreciated the four books better than the five.

DOC.Title: Gemini
DOC.TEXT: "Chomyo" "Shosetsu" "Shogun" "Pitti" "Spring Fall". Since the Han Dynasty, it was regarded as a fundamental sutra of Confucianism.

DOC.Title: Theory of justification
DOC.TEXT: Based on "spring and autumn", it is a theory to clarify the social intercourse and the principalities to be protected by the vassal and to try to rectify the relationship of the priests. Ouyango · Shima Hikari praised and Zhu Shi emphasized in the "Kochi journalism class".

DOC.Title: Distinction of Hua Yi
DOC.TEXT: The idea that Han people considered their culture as ideal, regarded their country as China, China and Hua Xia, and regard the peripheral peoples as low culture, "Yi". It is also called Chinese idea · Huayi thought. In the Song Dynasty during the external crisis, the specialization of Hua Yi was particularly emphasized.

DOC.Title: Luju-Nu, Nanhua mountain
DOC.TEXT: Confuciusist of South Song. Based on the ethical point of view, influenced by the Zen sect, received the theory of mind of "mind readiness", conflicted with Zhu Zhu. It influenced Ming Ming Ming.

DOC.Title: Shiba Hikaru
DOC.TEXT: Politician and Confucian scholar of North Song. It was the central figure of the former law party, became the prime minister of Setsun Shu, revived the old law. I compiled the history of "Confucian Traffic" based on Confucian ethics.

DOC.Title: "Tunnel Guide"
DOC.TEXT: History of the Year of the Year from the Warring States Period compiled by Shiba Hikaru until the end of Five Generations (403 to 959 before). It consists of 294 volumes, 30 volumes and 30 volumes. It began in 1066 and was completed in 1984. It was pierced by rigorous criticism of historical materials and the Confucian thesis of justified name and orthodoxy and had a great influence on posterity history.

DOC.Title: Yearly body
DOC.TEXT: History description method that marks incidents after years. It is represented by "spring and autumn" "capital circulation".

DOC.Title: Ouyang 脩
DOC.TEXT: Politician of North Song. Scholar / writer. One of the eight Tang Dynasty. Incorporating compilation of "Shin Tang" and "New Five-generation History" with the Chinese philosophy as the main theme, supplementing the restoration of the ancient language. As a politician I took charge of various officials, but retired against the new law of Wang'an stone.

DOC.Title: "New Tang Book"
DOC.TEXT: Masami 's history of the Tang Dynasty. 225 volume. It was compiled by Ouyang Yora. I formally used the country name of Japan with Japan in this book.

DOC.Title: Suzuki
DOC.TEXT: Literary man / scholar of North Song. One of the eight Tang Dynasty. Familiarity with various theories, joined in the compilation of 1 0 volume of "Factor Credit" relating to reward. It is called "Sansu" together with the Su Sukhua of the child.

DOC.Title: Su Suk, Su Dong Pa
DOC.TEXT: Literate / politician of Northern Song. Suzuko's child. As a bureaucrat, he took charge of local and central officials and opposed the new law of Wang'an stone. One of the eight Tang Dynasty. It is regarded as the first poet by the northern Song Dynasty, and the "Red Wall Gift" is famous.

DOC.Title: Sukut
DOC.TEXT: Literate / politician of Northern Song. Su Suki's brother. He served as a bureaucrat for local and central officials and opposed the new law of Wang'an stone. One of the eight Tang Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Safari
DOC.TEXT: Literate / politician of Northern Song. As a bureaucrat for a long time as a local official, I had friendship with Wang Taishi, but opposed that new law. One of the eight Tang Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Tang Dynasty and Hakka House
DOC.TEXT: Representative sentence house of Tang · Song Dynasty. Yang Yu Master of Tang, Yuan Yang of Song, Su Suk, Su Suk, Su Rut, Sam Gang, Wang Taishishi.

DOC.Title: Lyric
DOC.TEXT: A lyric singing along with the song, a kind of verse. It was stimulated by foreign music that was brought to the West region and developed as lyrics for Tang poetry, as a literature peculiar to Song Dynasty. It spread to each strata from Daio Otto to the commoners, and it increased the literary position.

DOC.Title: play
DOC.TEXT: Chinese classical theater. In Northern Song, it was established as a opera accompanied by songs, bars and gestures. Even gold was called "Hosono", it was completed as a former song (North song) in the original era.

DOC.Title: Gallery
DOC.TEXT: Abbreviation of Hallin Graphic Arts. An institution that governs the production of paintings at the court. It was established in the era of Tang 's Genkyo era, after five generations, it was protected and encouraged thickly by Song Dynasty, becoming the most competitive in the case of Huijong. Although it was abolished in the original era, it was revived to Ming Dynasty, and the Qing dynasty had a change in style due to the influence of missionary painters.

DOC.Title: Graduate body painting
DOC.TEXT: A painter drawn so as to conform to court hobby as a theme of flower birds, mountain water, people, etc, with the painter belonging to the painting center as the center. DOC.Title: Song dynasty
DOC.TEXT: Porcelain of Song Dynasty. Due to the spread of dumplings, the demand for teaware has increased and the technology of ceramic industry has developed. Mami · A masterpiece was born in such as white porcelain, celadon, Tenmyo (Tianmu is a Japanese name, the Chinese Temple) with fresh beauty. In addition to being used at the court, it was exported abroad and was regarded as a global art craft.

DOC.Title: Celadon
DOC.TEXT: Porcelain with green or blue color, with the base and the iron salt in the glaze being reduced during firing. It is said that the origin is in the ash glaze which starts in Yin · Zhou. Wei Jin became scattered from the North and South Korea era, and developed most in Song Dynasty.

DOC.Title: white porcelain
DOC.TEXT: Porcelain fired at high temperature, applying transparent glaze to white base. Wei Jin began in the North and the North and the most developed in Song Dynasty. The white magnetism of the fixed kiln and the blue white magnetism of Jingdezhen (shadow blue) are famous.

DOC.Title: Zen sect
DOC.TEXT: A faction of Buddhism trying to achieve enlightenment by zazen. After developing in Tang dynasty, spread from the Song Dynasty, mainly in the Daio Ozo, became the mainstream of Chinese Buddhism.

DOC.Title: Jodo sect
DOC.TEXT: A sect of Buddhism preaching Pure Land faith, wishing for paradise by Amida Buddha. The founder of the East Jin Founder, Taisei was established by the good of the Tang. In the Song Dynasty, it spread among the people, a Buddha French association was born, and became the mainstream of Chinese Buddhism with Zen sect. Also in the Song Dynasty, Zen and Nenbuto were combined together, Nenbutsu Zen became irrelevant.

DOC.Title: Gunpowder
DOC.TEXT: Black powder that mixes nitrate, sulfur and charcoal. It seems to be a by-product of alchemy in Tang Dynasty. Manufacturing method is described in Kita-sen's "Takebei general issue" (40 volumes, edited by Soko Ryora, completed in 1044). It was used for ignition and intimidation in the Southern Song Dynasty around 1135, was put into practical use in gold · original and was used in actual war.

DOC.Title: compass, magnetic needle
DOC.TEXT: The finger polarity of the magnet seems to have been known at the end of the Warring States Period, and there is also the theory that it was actually used for the Han dynasty. There is an article that "Takeshi total essential" used as a finger south fish (fish shaped magnetic iron as a way to know the direction by sprinkling with water). Likewise, in the second half of the 11 th century Northern Song of the "Yumeiwa Writing" (precipitation), an article saying that the magnetic needle was used for the earth's phase, the southern Song "Pingzhou possible talk" (Zhu Shui) was used for navigation There is an article. Strictly it was a magnetic needle, not a compass.

DOC.Title: woodblock printing
DOC.TEXT: It is presumed that it was invented for the first time in Tang. Existing Asia's oldest prints are Dharamni, a million tower that arrived from Horyu-ji. Tang Dynasty was primarily printed with Buddhist scriptures, calendar books, letters, etc., and handwriting was published in the fifth generation. It spread widely in Song Dynasty.

DOC.Title: "Financial economy"

It is also called "any war". The Taun 's fathers have printed the Finance Ministry with woodblock prints and published them in Chengdu.

DOC.Title: Kutani
DOC.TEXT: Mongolian nomadic hunters. It was called by the name of Kitai (Kitan) and I wrote it in China as Shitan. Since the 4th and 5th centuries, I was sending nomadic life at the Shilla Mulen River Basin of Liaohe Tributary. In the beginning of the 10th century when Tang 's rule had declined, they integrated the tribes and founded Liao. The name of Kitai was transmitted to the west and became another name of China, Khatai (Cathay).

DOC.Title: Liao
DOC.TEXT: Country that Katan's Zaya Aki built in East Mongolia. The capital is Chikyu Tokyo. In 926 Bohai was destroyed, and in 936 he won Yan Yun Clan six provinces, became a great empire that owns a part of Mongolia · Tohoku region · North China North, oppressing various dynasties of the Five generations and northern Song. In 947 the name was changed from Khitan to Liao, renamed again Kutani during 983 to 1066. Taking the double governance system, we endeavored to maintain self-cultivation, including establishing Kutranch letters, and encouraged Buddhism. It was reduced to 1125 pension.

DOC.Title: Zhuji Abo machine, Taejon
DOC.TEXT: The first emperor of Liao (ranking 916-926). We invaded North China, appointed Han people, kept national strength, integrated the Khitan tribes and established the country. He made a consecration against the west guy, Tangut Uyghur and destroyed the Balhae of the Tohoku region, conquered the northeastern region of China, but was sick in the middle of the triumphant regiment.

DOC.Title: Taejong, Buddhism bone

DOC.Title: Foundation of Shibuchi
DOC.TEXT: Peace treaty which Liao 's Seongjong and Shin Soong of Song joined together. Song is the older brother, Liao is the younger brother, Song Zhu announces that 200,000 silk and 100,000 silver will be given to Liao every year as a gift and the borders should be maintained as it is.澶 は is Masayo in Ganzhou (Henan Province) where the treaty is concluded. Peace has continued for a while since.

DOC.Title: Double governance system
DOC.TEXT: Governing system which separates northern ethnic groups and farmers in China and governs it. In Liao, against nomads such as Khitan people, we have established a government agency (north faculty office) that governs by tribal system unique to the nomads, and for established farmers such as Han / Bohai people, Government which governs (South Confeder official) was established and governed each. Northern officials ranked high and grasp political and military rights, but the proportion of agricultural areas on the financial side increased, their voice of opinion also increased, and they could not escape the han formation.

DOC.Title: Institution of Gojing

From Japan, arts and crafts such as gold dust and swords were exported, but from China it was imported from Song Qian, Song Dynasty, etc., Zen Buddhism and others also flowed, contributing to the development of Japanese economy and culture.

DOC.Title: East Asia Trade Area
DOC.TEXT: The trade zone where I came across the Sea of ​​Japan in the 12th century. South Song, Goryeo, Japan participated. Besides porcelain, textiles, books, Song Qian etc were also dealt with.

DOC.Title: Inland Asia
DOC.TEXT: In the middle of the Asian continent surrounded by the Mongolian plateau in the east, the Caspian Sea in the west, the Himalayas and Hindu Kush Mountains in the south and the Siberian woodlands in the north. In the arid zone, the grasslands and deserts including the oasis scattered with Takayama occupy the majority. Nomadic life in grassland areas, farming and living life and caravan trading were carried out in the desert oasis area, cultural exchanges between the east and west were promoted by nomads and caravans.

DOC.Title: Nomad People
DOC.TEXT: People who make domestic animals such as sheep, horses, cattle, etc. and engage in pastoralism while moving regularly. Moved in the dry grassland of the Eurasian Continent and brought into contact with farmers through trade and looting. It formed a tribal system (nomadic state) that emphasizes military bonds.

DOC.Title: Nomadic State
DOC.TEXT: A tribal system that nomads built. Since plundering and the like were also taken for daily life, the tribal union system which the tribe joined militarily was taken, and the qualities of the leader greatly influenced the rise and fall of the state.

DOC.Title: Major horse nomads
DOC.TEXT: Nomads who took on horse riding strategy and acquired combat skills. Having weapons and horses for cavalry warfare, we invaded, plundered and conquered the surrounding agricultural areas. Scythi · 匈 · · 厥 厥 厥 · · Mongolia etc. are representative.

DOC.Title: Scythai
DOC.TEXT: Around 6 to 4 th centuries ago, a cavalry nomads presumed to be of Iranian type who dominated South Russian meadow zone. It produced unique cavalry culture and had a great influence on nomads in Inland Asia.

DOC.Title: Scythai culture
DOC.TEXT: Following the influence of the metallic culture of Iran and Greece, the Scythian formed a cavalry culture. Characterized by the use of animal patterns and abundant gold on the weapons and horses etc.

DOC.Title: Path of steppe
DOC.TEXT: East-West traffic line that passes through the large step area connecting the grassland area of ​​South Russia-Kazakh Prairie Zone-Altai Mountain Foot-Mongolian Plateau. It was an area in which nomads of equestrian races such as Scythi, Pupils, Things, and Mongolia were active.

DOC.Title: Kageyama Mountains

DOC.Title: 匈 奴

Incorporating the Scythian cavalry culture, breaking the neighboring tribes, built the nomad nation. Since the warring States era, often invaded China. It split and declined with the attack by the Emperor of the Han Chinese and the internal conflict after the last century.

DOC.TEXT: A nation of Tibetan nomads established in the Qinghai district in the 4th and 7th centuries. The ruler is said to be a deep-bass system. He was affiliated with Tang in 635, and was destroyed by 663 vigor.

DOC.Title: vigor
DOC.TEXT: Soncheng = Gangpo built in Tibet. We interacted with India and Tang and laid the foundation for Tibetan culture.

DOC.Title: Oasis City
DOC.TEXT: A city formed around the oasis (oasis) where dry springs and river water can be used in arid regions such as deserts and grasslands. Walls and artificial groundwater paths (Kanato <Curries>) etc. were maintained, and small agriculture and fruit tree cultivation was carried out. It became a relay point of east-west exchanges and became a political, economic and military contest.

DOC.Title: caravan trading
DOC.TEXT: Trading that a merchant makes a group for safety and efficiency by using camels and horses when moving. Especially on the way of oasis, long distance trade was carried out and played a big part in the propagation of culture.

DOC.Title: Dunhuang
DOC.TEXT: Oasis city in the west end of Gansu Province. After the rule of Mr. Moon · 匈 奴, Emperor Wang of the former set up the county around 121 years ago, importance was placed on trade and western regional management as a door to the Chinese side to the western region. A cave temple called Mogao cave (Choshu-dong) built from the 4th century is famous for murals and Buddha images, and the "Dunhuang document" was also discovered at the end of the 19th century.

DOC.Title: Kucha
DOC.TEXT: Oasis city in the northern part of the Tarim Basin. In the center of western regional management, in the Western province Miyako Miyako, and in Tang Anzeishi Guardians were placed. The Buddhist culture flourished, and the cave temples were excavated in the 20th century.

DOC.Title: Hotan, Us 闐
DOC.TEXT: Oasis city on the south side of the Tarim Basin. Indigenous people are Arya. It flourished from the Han Dynasty, and contributed to the Buddhist Tigers. Specialty balls are famous as Yu Yu's balls.

DOC.Title: Kashgar, Khaku
DOC.TEXT: Oasis city in western Tarim Basin. It flourished as the main point of the traffic of Tian Shan South Road.

DOC.Title: Pamir Plateau
DOC.TEXT: Plateau located in the southeast part of Central Asia. Also called "the roof of the world" mountain ranges such as Himalaya, Hindu Cush, Tian Mountain gather, the Indus River, Am River and Tarim River originate from here.

DOC.Title: Am River
DOC.TEXT: A river that emanates from the Pamir Plateau and pours into the Aral Sea. It is also called Oxos river.

DOC.Title: Shirukawa
DOC.TEXT: A river that emanates to the Tian Shan Mountain Range and pours into the Aral Sea parallel to the Am River in the south. It is also called the Yaksales River. Along with the Am River Basin, played an important role in East-West trade.

DOC.Title: Turkistan
DOC.TEXT: "Turkish people's region" means most of Central Asia. Naming since the Uyghur migration of the 9th century promoted Turkishization in this area. It was divided into the east and west with the Pamir Plateau as the border, and since the long ago the exchange between the oasis city and nomads was complicated.

DOC.Title: East Turkistan
DOC.TEXT: An area in the eastern part of Pamir including the Tarim Basin. The size of the oasis is small, but the oasis cities such as Kucha and Hotan prospered.

DOC.Title: Western Turkistan
DOC.TEXT: An area centered on the river basin both in the west of Pamir. Megumi and meadow steam, and there are many large-scale oasis as compared to the east.

DOC.Title: Bactria
DOC.TEXT: A kingdom built by the Greek residents of the Am River basin independently from the Seleucid morning. It retained Hellenistic culture and expanded its influence to Northwest India, but it was destroyed by the invasion of the great summer in the 2nd century.

DOC.Title: Great summer
DOC.TEXT: Region / ethnic name centered on the Am River basin, the present northern part of Afghanistan. Since the Tohala destroyed Bactria in the 2nd century BC, I call this area Tohara, I wrote that in China it is big summer. It was ruled by Mr. Otsuki in the first century.

DOC.Title: Mr. Otsuki
DOC.TEXT: Mr. Moon moved from the Ily province to the Am River upstream area after being chased by the fellows and grandchildren. It expanded to the Bactrian region and conquered the big summer. In China, Kushana morning also called Mr. Otsuki.

DOC.Title: Felgana, majority
DOC.TEXT: Region of the upper stream of the Sill River. A nation of Iranian residents was built and thrived as the key point of East-West trade. It is known for the warrior who received Zhang Zhu's report to expedite the expedition of Lee Hyo Ri, seeking a maid called sweat horses.

DOC.Title: Sogodeana
DOC.TEXT: An area sandwiched between Am Sill River. The center of Western Turkestan. Conflict as a key point of East-West trade for a long time has been fought and changed from Achaemenid, Alexandros, Bactria, Mr. Otsuki, Kushana, Sasan, Eftal, Islam and Islamic territory. I marked it as milk in China.

DOC.Title: Sogged person
DOC.TEXT: Iranian ethnic group of Sogdeana. He played an active role in East-West trade since ancient times, creating an oasis city in various places. It tells Zoroastrianism and Maniacism to Central Asia and East Asia.

DOC.Title: Sogd word
DOC.TEXT: Persian language of India = European language. Since the 7th century, it was used as a common language in Central Asia.

DOC.Title: sogged character
DOC.TEXT: Characters used by Soguto people. Characters derived from Aramaic characters, popular in Central Asia, became prototypes of Uighur, Mongolian and Manchurian characters.

DOC.Title: Samarkand
DOC.TEXT: The central city of Sogdiana. Known as the name of Malakanda during the Alexander the Great Kingdom, it was written as Yangoku in China during the South and North Korea, Sui and Tang Dynasties. Prosperous as the key point of East-West trade, Islamization advanced in the 7th and 8th centuries.

DOC.Title: Battle on the bank of the Taras
DOC.TEXT: A battle where the Islamic Abbas army army defeated Chinese Chinese army on the bank of the Thalas of northern Central Asia. Since then, the advancement of Islamic forces into Central Asia has become full-scale and Islam has advanced.

DOC.Title: Morning Thurman
