DOC.TEXT: A land register maintained in the Ming Dynasty. The number of the land, the position, the boundary, the type, the tax amount of the owner, etc. were noted. This section was named because the section of the land was described in a form resembling the scales of the fish.

DOC.Title: Rokusi
DOC.TEXT: Lessons of the six articles released by Emperor Hongdu in 1397. "Put your father and mother in law, respect it, respect your hometown, rejoice in your hometown, Lessons from descendants, do not worry physiologically, do not worship", through this old man got this thorough . We aimed to train people "to be satisfied with the position in which they were placed by keeping order" to nurture people who are obedient to power and order. It also influenced the "educational imperial word" created in the Meiji era of Japan.

DOC.Title: Ri old man
DOC.TEXT: Under the village regime, the position which kept the order of the village and chief education etc. An elders who were considered to have excellent personality in the village were chosen.

DOC.Title: Kenji, Emperor
DOC.TEXT: 諡 is Emiki. The grandson of Hongwu Emperor, Emperor of the second generation in the morning (ranking 1398 ~ 1402). Due to forcible confiscation of the domains of the clan and the king, it became the role of Yasushi by my uncle (Tan Yang), and in the midst of it, it became missing.

DOC.Title: Role of Yasushi
DOC.TEXT: Ming Dynasty of Ming. In response to the king's repression measures by the Ho Empa, her uncle's Yan Yang made a rebellion called "I will not appreciate the difficulties of the imperial family except for the one on your side" and took over Nanjing and robbed the throne.

DOC.Title: 燕王 朱 棣
DOC.TEXT: Later Emperor Yongle. In the fourth child of Zhu Yuan, he was ruling over Beijing neighborhood (Tsubame no kuni), so he was called Yan Ya.

DOC.Title: Emperor Yongle, ancestor
DOC.TEXT: Emperor of the 3rd Dynasty tomorrow (Rim 1402 ~ 24). As Tan Ya, he was defending the northern side in Kitahei (later Beijing), but he played a role of Yasushi and throne. He emphasized the eunuch to strengthen the dictatorship of the emperor, restored the Great Wall and the Grand Canal, and made a capital to Beijing. In addition, Mongolian prostitution, Vietnam expedition, Zheng-do was ordered to the Nankai expedition, but the 5th Mongolian parents' conclusion, the disease died.

DOC.Title: Kitahei, Beijing
DOC.TEXT: It is the capital city of Mincho (and Qing Dynasty) since 1421. Emperor Yongle changed capital of Beijing and transferred to capital.

DOC.Title: Cabinet
DOC.TEXT: In 1402, the highest institution of politics established in the era of Yongle emperor and functioned until the middle of Qing dynasty. It consisted of several college professors selected from the Hallinnobu branch and assisted the emperor, but later the authority expanded and the principal college degree became the de facto president.

DOC.Title: Cabinet College Degree
DOC.TEXT: A college graduate who belonged to the Cabinet and assisted the emperor. After that, as the cabinet was more involved in important political affairs, the chief college degree became the de facto president.

DOC.Title: Mongolia expedition
DOC.TEXT: Five times expedition to the Mongolian Plateau led by Emperor Yongle himself. The first and second blows were given to Eilat · 韃靼 (Tatar), but since then it was only a financial burden, the result was not improved. On the way back from the fifth expedition, Emperor Yongle died and was terminated.

DOC.Title: Zheng Wen
DOC.TEXT: An Islam and an eunuch from Yunnan. He was appointed Emperor Yongle in the role of Yasushi and was appointed commander of Nankai Expedition of seven times, and he was active.

DOC.Title: Nankai Country Expedition
DOC.TEXT: An expedition to the Indian Ocean, where Chungwae is the commander. It was carried out seven times in 1405-33 years (6 out of which was Eikyu Emperor, 7th only due to the life of Imperial Emperor). A large fleet centered on a large boat called the treasure ship visited Southeast Asia, southern coast and west Asia, some of them reached Mecca and Malindi on the east coast of Africa. As a result, tributaries from the coastal countries of the Indian Ocean were promoted, Nankai trade became active, and a lot of information was brought.

DOC.Title: Ban Treaty
DOC.TEXT: It refers to restrictions such as maritime traffic and trade / fishing activities conducted in China. In the Ming Dynasty (beginning of the year), we started with countermeasures against Wa, restricted overseas ship traversal, Chinese overseas travel, foreign trade, foreign ship construction and ownership, fishing activities etc. (Meanwhile, We maintained and promoted trade under government control). In the latter half of the Ming Dynasty, the (late) Yao became more intense, but after nearly succeeding its suppression, it relaxed in 1567.

DOC.Title: Morning Trade
DOC.TEXT: Fruitful trade form China makes with the tributary. This was a kind of trade, as China gave the country which had been doing tribute (tribute to the virtue of the emperor) to give refuge as a benefit. As a result of the morning tribunal, this gift item was of great interest, I wanted to increase the number of morning talks, but China has restrictions such as fiscal year, quantity, number of people, route, departure port, trade merchant, trade item, number of days stayed I gave permission. Such trade forms were also applied to Europeans who came in the 16th century.

DOC.Title: Binding system
DOC.TEXT: The international order that China formed by linking formal Kimishi relations with neighboring countries. In the Ming and Qing dynasties, Japan, Ryukyu, Korea Dynasty, Dynasty (Vietnam) etc entered under the sealed system.

DOC.Title: Bei Hisaki Minami Wa
DOC.TEXT: It refers to the invasion of Oirat Tatar from the north, Wa Shi from the south (east), who afflicted Ming Dynasty. These foreign diseases have made the decline of the tomorrow faster.

DOC.Title: Kitamoto
DOC.TEXT: It is said to be the former after I was deprived of the great capital clearly and retired to the Mongolian Plateau. It was a serious defeat at the attack by Emperor Hongwu, and it was destroyed in two generations.

DOC.Title: Orthodox Emperor, Eiken
DOC.TEXT: Emperor sixth generation tomorrow morning (ranking 1435-49). Politics was disturbed by the eunuch, the turbulence of the western side of Yunnan and the rebellion of the Deng-seven occurred, and in 1449 it was caught by the Eurat army at the Hebei Province Civil Warp. After being repatriated, he restored and became the 8th Ryuten Emperor (ranking 1457-64).

DOC.Title: 韃靼, Tatar
DOC.TEXT: It refers to the Mongolian tribe who fled to the Mongol plateau after the ruin of the former morning. Akira translated Tatar and called "韃靼". After the destruction of Northern origin, it was pressed by Eilat, but in the latter half of the 15th century, due to the emergence of Danyang Han, unity in Inner Mongolia, also controlled Eurat and put the majority of the Mongolian Plateau under temporary control . The Turkish / Mongolian nomads in the direction of Siberia, which is called "Tatar" by Russia and Europe, is a different ethnic group from this one.

DOC.Title: Esen-Han
DOC.TEXT: Oirat 's leader. Unification of all Mongolia, 1449 civil warriors defeated the Ming Army, captured the English Kingdom. It became Han in 1453, but was killed by his subordinate the following year.

DOC.Title: Civil Warfare
DOC.TEXT: Ming advancement base in northern Hebei province.

DOC.Title: Civil engineering change
DOC.TEXT: In 1449, the case where Akira 's Hideki became a prisoner of Eirat in the civil engineering fortune.

DOC.Title: Eurat, patchwork
DOC.TEXT: Mongolian tribe based in Northeastern Mongolia. Emerging after the original decline, in the middle of the 15th century, it unified the Mongolian plateau under Esen and boasted a temporary strong prospect, threatening Ming Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Altan Han
DOC.TEXT: He is the chief of. And the grandson of Da Yang. Although it often invaded from the middle of the 16th century, it was reconciled in 1571, sealed by the prosthetic King, and made tributary trade. In the west, we extended the power to Omirate in the direction of Qinghai / Tibet. After that, he devoted himself to Tibetan Buddhism (Huang school) and disseminated it to Mongolia, and offered the title of Dalai-Lama to his leader.

DOC.Title: Wa Hao
DOC.TEXT: Pirates and merchant groups who worked in the 13th and 16th centuries along the coast of Korea and China. "Wa" refers to the Japanese. It is divided into the early period of the 14th century century and the latter term of the 16th century. In the previous term, mainly the Japanese group was active from the coast of the Korean coast to the coast of China, but in the latter term, the Chinese group who principally appointed Yao was active around the coast of China.

DOC.Title: Ban calendar, God Buddhism
DOC.TEXT: The 14th emperor tomorrow morning (ranking 1572 to 1620). Initially I got an assistant from Zhang Zeijin and rebuilt the dynasty, but after that the politics was disturbed by heavy eunuchs. As a result, intensification of party fighting and deterioration of public finances due to external expeditions resulted in the decline of Ming.

DOC.Title: Eunuch
DOC.TEXT: A castrated man serving the shrine. In the morning, some of the emperors played an active part in the role of Yasushi, and some empathized with emperors, some of which showed success like Zheng Wen, but later became an aide of the emperor and caused political turmoil, causing the tomorrow's decline became.

DOC.Title: Zhang Zheng Ming
DOC.TEXT: Ming dynasty. Early in the reign of Emperor Emperor, he served as the principal cabinet college college. Externally, we have sought to save military expenditure and defense of the Northeast by keeping peace with Han Tan Han, and on the internal affairs side, we rebuilt the public finances by promoting administrative reorganization, door survey and land survey.

DOC.Title: constitutional constitution
DOC.TEXT: Ming dynasty. After being dismissed in conflict with Zhang Yui, after returning home, he rebuilt Donglin Shoin, became the leader of the Dobayashi party, developed criticism of intense politics.

DOC.Title: Toho Shoin University
DOC.TEXT: Ming tomorrow's school. In 1604, Construction and Construction began in Wuxi (Jiangsu Province). Together with lectures, he criticized bureaucrats and criticized politics from the standpoint of Zhuzhi scholarship and influenced politics as the center of the East Liberal Democratic Party. It was forcibly closed in 1625.

DOC.Title: Toho Art branch
DOC.TEXT: A political party with close relations with Tohboso. Criticizing the extent of the cabinet and eunuchs critically, at one time it had a great influence on central politics, but received a great crackdown from the eunuchs. After that, they restored their forces again and continued party fighting until the end of the light.

DOC.Title: Non-forest faction
DOC.TEXT: A bureaucratic influence that fought with the eunuch school of Wei-tsen and wise, a faction with Tohbayashi. He developed a fierce party controversy with the Tobayashi faction, which resulted in Ming Dynasty and Decline.

DOC.Title: Wei Tadayoshi
DOC.TEXT: eunuch. Tied to the non-forest faction and cracked the Tobayashi faction. He later died and committed suicide.

DOC.Title: Great Wall of Modern Residence
DOC.TEXT: Ming Dynasty, a large project that Emperor Yongle started for North defense. It was aggressively after the invasion of Oirat, and in the 15th-16th century the existing Great Wall, extending from Sankai Seki to Jiayuguan, a length of 2400 km, was restored.

DOC.Title: Chung emperor, Takeshi
DOC.TEXT: The end of Ming Dynasty, the 17th Emperor (ranking 1627-44). We rejected Wei Tadashi and reconstructed Ming Dynasty with Xu Gwan. However, suffering from the offensive of Qing and the rebellion of the famine continued, Lee himself was captured Beijing and committed suicide, Ming has been destroyed.

DOC.Title: Li self composition
DOC.TEXT: Megumi 's rebel army leader. Joined the rebellion of the faminees and became leaders after 1636, occupied Beijing in 44 years, destroyed Ming. Shortly thereafter he was sentenced to Wu San-Katsura and Qing Army to rush to Xi'an and committed suicide.

DOC.Title: Tungus
DOC.TEXT: People who live in eastern Siberia and northeastern China, ethnic groups using Altai and Tungus languages.靺鞨 · Balhae · female god · Manchuria and others. Mainly engaged in hunting, some settled and run agriculture.

DOC.Title: female true, female direct, Manchurian
DOC.TEXT: Tungus-type ethnic group who lived in the Tohoku region of China. After the destruction of gold (1115-1234), it was subordinated to former and Ming, but integration progressed in the end, becoming independent and founded.

DOC.Title: Jeju Department
DOC.TEXT: A girl's true family who lived in the southeast of northeastern China. Akira set up Jeonju San for its control, but the conflict continued with the interference of Korea in the conflict between the tribes in Jeju.

DOC.Title: Manju, Manchuria <Manchuria>
DOC.TEXT: Originally Qing Dynasty expressed his own race and country name. He wrote Manchuria with Chinese characters, and gradually began to point to the region where the Qing Dynasty rose (the present Tohoku region of China).

DOC.Title: Nurhachi, Taic
DOC.TEXT: First Emperor of Qing Dynasty (ranking 1616 ~ 26). Jeonju women's true chief, Successfully unified the girls. In 1616, he built a late gold nation for Han position, 19 years broke the Ming Army and entered Liaodong direction. It also created the Yanbian system · Manchuria letters.

DOC.Title: money back, money
DOC.TEXT: Country name at the time of Qing dynasty construction. It is named after the golden dynasty of the 12th century. In the era of the second generation Taoism, renamed as Qing in 1636. The capital is Shenyang.

DOC.Title: Yagi flag
DOC.TEXT: Qing Dynasty's own military organization. It consists of eight corps called "flag". Each flag was distinguished by a total of eight kinds of flags consisting of yellow, white, red and indigo, and edges attached to each. Each flag was organized with 300 men as 1 NILL, 5 NILL (1500) as 1 JALAN, 5 JIYARAN (7,500) as 1 GUSA (flag). Nuruha set up the Manchuria Eight Flags, and Mongolian Eight Flags and Han Army Flags were added in the Taesong era.

DOC.Title: Flag Man
DOC.TEXT: The warrior class belonging to the Yagami. It consisted mainly of Manchurian people, Mongolian people and Han people. It was incorporated into the flag (original family register), given various privileges and flags, formed the ruler of Qing dynasty.

DOC.Title: Flag area
DOC.TEXT: It refers to the land the Qing Dynasty has given to the flag man. Restrictions such as ban on resale were set for the flag area, but the collapse became marked in the second half of the Qing Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Manchuria Eight Flag
DOC.TEXT: Origin of the Yagi flag. Nurhachi started in the beginning of the 17th century.

DOC.Title: Mongolia Eight Flag
DOC.TEXT: Tajong organized with Mongolian soldiers in the first half of the 17th century.

DOC.Title: Han Army Eight Flag
DOC.TEXT: Taejong organized around Han Chinese in the mid 17th century.

DOC.Title: green manuscript
DOC.TEXT: One of the regular forces of the Qing Dynasty to the Qigong Flag. Since the Qing Dynasty entered the mainland of China, it was an army organized by Han people, also called "green flag" by its flag color. Mainly to maintain security, but weakened in the latter part of the Qing Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Taejong, Hong Taiji
DOC.TEXT: Qing Dynasty second Emperor (ranking 1626-43). Inner Mongolia was flattened, the name of the country was renamed as Qing 1636, and in the following 37 years, Korea was regarded as a country.

DOC.Title: Chahar Department
DOC.TEXT: Some Mongolian-based tribes that begin in the Ming Dynasty. Although it dominated Inner Mongolia, in 1635, it lost to Tajong.

DOC.Title: "If the river matures ripens, it will be full of deeds"
DOC.TEXT: Lake Hiroshi is a collective term for both Hunan and Hubei provinces. In the Ming Dynasty, the production of rice in the same district in the Yangtze River Basin surpassed the downstream Jiangsu and Zhejiang, this word became popular in place of Song Dynasty "Jiang Zhe ripe if you mature.

DOC.Title: Mexican silver
DOC.TEXT: Since the 16th century, Spain has used Latin American silver coins for trade with Asia. After the latter half of the 16th century, it was exchanged with silk fabrics and ceramics brought by Chinese merchants, using Spanish territory Manila as an intermediary site, and accelerated the distribution of silver in China.

DOC.Title: Horseshoe Silver
DOC.TEXT: Horseshoe-shaped silver mass used in China of Ming and Qing dynasty since yuan. Weighing currency used with its value determined by weight.

DOC.Title: Nippon Silver
DOC.TEXT: Silver exported from Japan to China. Particularly in the late Ming Dynasty where the production of silver from China declined, it was imported and distributed in large quantities.

DOC.Title: Stag beetle
DOC.TEXT: Tax system implemented from the late Ming Dynasty to the beginning of Qing dynasty. New tax law which decided to pay all the rice (land tax) and tax (population tax) etc together in silver. In the latter half of the 16th century, it first came into force in Gangnam, spreading nationwide by the end of the same century. It reflects the growth of silver circulation.

DOC.Title: Guest Business
DOC.TEXT: A long distance merchant who does not settle in one place but carries and sells the property of each place.

DOC.Title: Suzhou
DOC.TEXT: A commercial and industrial city located in Jiangsu Province. In the Ming Dynasty it prospered greatly in the water transportation and silk fabric industry, became the center of the national economy, but in the late period of Qing Dynasty it gave its position to Shanghai.

DOC.Title: Hangzhou
DOC.TEXT: Provincial capital of Zhejiang province. Located at the southern end of the Grand Canal, prosperity continued since the Suiyo period, but Ming / Qing Dynasty was quite silk textile industry.

DOC.Title: Shinan Merchant, Huzhou Merchant
DOC.TEXT: A customer deal from Anhui Province Huizhou (prefecture Shinshan county). Especially, it profited greatly in trading salt, which is a monopoly, and contributed to the development of the Chinese economy from late Ming Dynasty to Qing dynasty. In Gangnam I overwhelmed Shanxi merchants.

DOC.Title: Shanxi merchant
DOC.TEXT: A shopper from Shanxi Province. He worked as a politician since the beginning. After that, he acted nationwide, mainly in the financial industry and the transportation industry, and competed for prosperity with Shinhan merchants.

DOC.Title: Hall · Public place
DOC.TEXT: A building built for friendship and mutual aid by businessmen and businessmen of business and industrial relations. It began around the Song Dynasty and was developed and developed after the Ming.

DOC.Title: Jingdezhen
DOC.TEXT: China's first ceramic production place in Jiangxi province. It has developed since the Song Dynasty, was exported overseas to the world during the Ming Qing era and became world famous.

DOC.Title: Chinese overseas
DOC.TEXT: Chinese who migrated abroad and their descendants. South China Oceania to Southeast Asia is the most popular. Although the origin of migration abroad can be seen from the Han Dynasty, it gradually became irrelevant, and in the Ming Dynasty, the number of people traveling by committing the ban on the sea has increased drastically.

DOC.Title: Civilian
DOC.TEXT: Megumi Soo First, the riot performed by wage workers and others. Ming Dynasty dispatched eunuchs and began with rebellion against severe tax collection from urban handicrafts.

DOC.Title: Difficult
DOC.TEXT: A riot for liberation released by his wife in the house. Ming Ming first occurred mainly in Gangnam in Shandong, Fujian, Henan.

DOC.Title: Shiroi Landlord
DOC.TEXT: Absentee landowner who transferred the base of life to the city among the squire. Many appeared in Gangnam where the monetary economy advanced.

DOC.Title: Suidobade
DOC.TEXT: By the enforcement of both tax laws, especially the peasant farmers spread since the Song Dynasty. It is legally seen as a free nation, it is said that Ming Dynasty improved its position and management became independent.

DOC.Title: Anti-taxable movement
DOC.TEXT: The struggle that Shizukido made to the landowner over the royalty fee. It occurred frequently in Henan and Gangnam since the beginning of the Ming Dynasty. Dengsei's turbulence is a typical example.

DOC.Title: Zu school student
DOC.TEXT: Confucianism which Taisei Zhu (1130 ~ 1200) of Southern Song was Taisei. It was regarded as government officials in Japan and Korea as well as Ming. It is the main content such as dualism called the theory and the theory of civil name theory which respects the order of the hierarchical relationship, etc., and emphasized "Four books" in place of the conventional "goshi".

DOC.Title: Wang Yi Ming, Wang Meng
DOC.TEXT: A scholar and politician of Ming. People in Zhejiang. Although he arrived at the office, he opposed the eunuch, so he was transferred to Guizhou Province. Completed Yomeumaku in this place. After that he played active part in rebellion of various places and was sick in Jiangxi province.

DOC.Title: Yomei University
DOC.TEXT: A theory of Confucianism with the origin of Wang Yi Ming. It was popular in the late Ming Dynasty. Although Zhuji studies tended to focus on objectivity and stopped in theory, taking a position of subjective mind readiness, put emphasis on practice. Representative of Youmi University in Japan is Fujii Nakae.

DOC.Title: Heart immediacy
DOC.TEXT: Basic principle of Yomei University established by Wang Yong Ming (Wang Guo-Jin). Denial of thought that separates the reasons and sentiments of Zhuzhi school, assuming that the work of mind is Tenri as it is.

DOC.Title: Koichi Kubota
DOC.TEXT: One of the basic principles of Yomeumaku. "Knowing is the beginning of doing, what we do is completion of knowing", and the idea that both recognition and practice are unitary.

DOC.Title: Tech knowledge
DOC.TEXT: The ultimate principle that Yomei has reached (enlightenment). The idea of ​​correcting things thoroughly (aiming at realization of ideal society) by thoroughly investigating the action (mind) of the mind which judges good and evil originally in the human mind.

DOC.Title: Lee Sang, Lee Kego
DOC.TEXT: A representative philosopher of the left-wing of Yomei in Ming Dynasty. Retired from officials and devoted to writing. Believe in Buddism and respect the child 's heart, accusing Confucian scholarship as a hypocrisy, defending merchant's profit activities, and preaching gender equality. Because of that, he was regarded as a rebel, he was imprisoned and committed suicide.

DOC.Title: "Eikuma Dai-ichi"
DOC.TEXT: The largest Chinese book (encyclopedia) compiled by Yongle emperor's life. 22,877 volume. Completed in 1408.

DOC.Title: "Four Books Great"
DOC.TEXT: Annotation of "Four books" compiled by the life of Emperor Yongle. Volume 36. It is published in 1415. It was the basis for interpretation during the examination of the examination.

DOC.Title: "Sengoku Daigaku"
DOC.TEXT: Annotation of "Goshiki" compiled by the life of Emperor Yongle. 154 volume. It is published in 1415. It was the basis for interpretation during the examination of the examination.

DOC.Title: "Sexual performance"
DOC.TEXT: Song by Yongle Emperor's Song-A compilation of the original Song Dynasty (sexuality) theory. Volume 70. Completed in 1415.

DOC.Title: Yellow sect
DOC.TEXT: Ming and Qing first scholar. After the destruction of Ming, we tried to make a mistake but failed, I devoted myself to writing without serving the Qing Dynasty. It is regarded as a pioneer of the study of the study. "A Mei Imouto visit" is a masterpiece work.

DOC.Title: Takeshi Kohira
DOC.TEXT: Ming and Qing first scholar. He did not serve the Qing as a priest of Ming, devoted himself to academic and writing. He emphasized positivism and laid the foundation for the study of matter. "Japan intellectual green" etc. in his book.

DOC.Title: Anthropology
DOC.TEXT: A part of Confucianism established in the end of the Ming and established in the middle of Qing dynasty. We criticized part of Yomeumaku who fainted as subjective Song Dynasty and Jiro Theory and tried to investigate the classic objectively and empirically. In the severe thought crackdown of the Qing Dynasty abandoning political practice, devoted to classical research.

DOC.Title: Practical academics, academic success
DOC.TEXT: The meaning of science useful for society. Demonstration studies also departed from there. This trend of the Ming dynasty also appears in the activation of the publication of technical documents, and the influence from the Christian missionary who came in can also be seen.

DOC.Title: "All Agricultural Policy"
DOC.TEXT: A comprehensive book on agricultural policy and agriculture. Volume 60. Book of Xu Gwan, published in 1639 after death. It compiles together the theories of ancient agricultural books and compiled it with reference to the Western techniques and others conveyed by Christian missionaries at the time. It is described in 12 categories such as agricultural books, Tanjyu, agriculture, irrigation, drinking, arts and silkworms.

DOC.Title: Xu Gwan
DOC.TEXT: Ming dynasty and scholar. I became a cabinet college university with the official. Together with Mateo Ricci, he was baptized in 1603 and entered Christianity and studied western theology. In addition to "geometric original", translated with Rich, "Takatsunetsuke" and "All agricultural policy" were compiled.

DOC.Title: "Primary heritage"
DOC.TEXT: In the comprehensive book on drugs, published in 1596. Volume 52. It is written by Lee Hsiao. Based on ancient relativity books, 1898 drugs and their prescription 8161 cases are included.

DOC.Title: Lee Chun
DOC.TEXT: Ming Pharmaceutical. Author of 'Honkusukei'.

DOC.Title: "Craftsmanship"
DOC.TEXT: Explanatory manual with graphic of industrial technology. Volume 3. Published in 1637. Song by Negi Star. It was explained in detail in 18 divisions of ancient industrial technology, such as clothing, ceramics, casting, brewing and weapons.

DOC.Title: Song Satoshi
DOC.TEXT: Ming and Qing first scholar. There are "books of celestial craft" written in the book.

DOC.Title: "Suten Calendar"
DOC.TEXT: In the late Mr. Xuzhou, with the cooperation of the Jesuit missionaries, the calendar written by Western calendar law. Volume 135. It was not enforced in the Ming and was implemented as a "time calendar" which was modified slightly in Qing 1645.

DOC.Title: "Water Margin"
DOC.TEXT: A long novel compiled around the 14th century by Mr. Luo Naka of the original dressing armor. A story of the brutal story of 108 people of the Australian Jihad who set in Shandong at the end of North Song.

DOC.Title: "Three Kingdoms award"
DOC.TEXT: A long-length historical novel by Luo Nanaka. Through the heroes' hero gods the conflict of the Three Kingdoms era, painting complicated majestically. Together with "Water Margin" it is regarded as a representative of Chinese popular literature.

DOC.Title: "Journey to the West"
DOC.TEXT: A long story of colloquialism of Wu poet works. It was completed in the second half of the 16th century. Set in India tour of Genkanzan, Son Goku story is a great weirdogical story.

DOC.Title: "Golden plum"
DOC.TEXT: Maku no Sexual Novel. Author unknown. A story developed by developing a part of "Water Margin". Describing the backside living of the merchant. It is estimated that it is a work from the end of the 16th century to the beginning of the 17th century.

DOC.Title: Four Great Big Books
DOC.TEXT: "Water Margin" "Mikokushi Jiyoshi" "Journey to the West" "Jingu plum" that was established in the Ming Dynasty.

DOC.Title: "Old miracle now"
DOC.TEXT: A collection of short stories based on common folk tales. 40 volumes. The real name of the editor is unknown. It is estimated that it is Ming Dynasty.

DOC.Title: "Buddite Temple Returns"
DOC.TEXT: Ming dynasty feature drama. Yu et al. A drama with a rhetorical content that the daughter who loved the young man who dreamed of is resurrected again after death and is connected with the young man.

DOC.Title: literary painting
DOC.TEXT: A painting drawn by a non-professional painter such as Daio Owa and Witanabe against a picture of a professional painter. It prospered in Five generations · Song, and a style to draw the mountain water painting softly by the former four major houses was created. Ming Chang and others came out in the end and it was a heyday.

DOC.Title: Minami, Minami
DOC.TEXT: The former four finalists' styles form stylized literary paintings. In a style using thin and soft drawn lines repeatedly, it became prosperous in Ming Dynasty. Tang Dynasty was Taisei.

DOC.Title: Tung Chang
DOC.TEXT: A painter / calligrapher in the end. Although he also served as a politician, he quit the officer himself. In addition to creating excellent works as a painter and calligrapher, he established painting methods and theories of the Nanjong painting.

DOC.Title: Graduate body painting
DOC.TEXT: Painting in a court style painted at the court's gallery set up after the era of Tang's Emperor Xuanjong. Prioritize realism, method, decorative effect. Works that were excellent in the northern Song Dynasty and Southern Song Dynasty period were produced, but later they ran into skill and form, the style of the pain declined.

DOC.Title: North Painting, Northern Painting
DOC.TEXT: Painting style created by a professional painter, beginning in the Tang Dynasty. Features a raindrop coloring and mountain water painting using sharp contour lines, but many of them do not necessarily fall within this category. There are many things painted by artists, and while they are superb in terms of skills, uniform style of painting is also noticeable. Representative of Ming Dynasty's enemies.

DOC.Title: Enemy
DOC.TEXT: Beijing painter around the early 16th century. Excellent for people and genre painters, it is regarded as one of the three major houses of hospital (school of organization).

DOC.Title: dyeing
DOC.TEXT: On the top of painting indigo painting, ceramics baked with a transparent vitreous glaze. It started from the end of Song and originated in Ming Dynasty in Jingdezhen.

DOC.Title: red illustration
DOC.TEXT: Ceramics which painted patterns with glaze such as red · green · yellow, black · blue on white magnetic. Especially developed in Ming Dynasty, Jingdezhen was the center.

DOC.Title: Kiyoshi
DOC.TEXT: The dynasty of the girls from the northeastern China. Nurhac built up the golden country by integrating the girls and gods, 2nd generation Taejong changed the country name to 1636 sera. It entered China by the death of 1644, and unified China mainland on behalf of Ming. Further expanded the territory, formed a large area in the middle of the 18th century, and intimidated the East Asian region with clever governance measures. However, contradictions surfaced in the 19th century, under the Opium war invaded by the imperialist powerful power, the Great Revolution annihilated in 1912.

DOC.Title: Shunya Emperor, Genji
DOC.TEXT: Qing Dynasty 3rd Emperor (ranking 1643-61). Until 1651, his uncle's Dogon and his colleagues became regent. In 1644, entered the mainland of China with the destruction of Ming, a capital to Beijing. We flattered Lee's own turbulence and tried to unify the whole of China.

DOC.Title: Sankai Seki
DOC.TEXT: It faces the Bohai Bay and is the main point of transportation and military situated at the border between mainland China and the Tohoku region. It was also the starting point in the east of the Great Wall. The Qing Army passed through here and invaded the mainland of China.

DOC.Title: Kure Satoshi
DOC.TEXT: Megumi Suki's first warrior. Initially it was in conflict with the Qing Army in Sankai Seki, but when Akira collapsed it fell to the Qing Dynasty and cooperated with the Qing Army 's peaceful determination. It was sealed by the clan king of Yunnan due to its success. However, because the Qing Dynasty decided to reduce the power of the clan king for centralization, in 1673 the three clan 's turbulence occurred.

DOC.Title: Beijing
DOC.TEXT: Originally known as an important city, it was known as an important city, such as 薊 · 玉 key from the ancient times, former (the name of this era is the big capital) · Ming · Qing, the capital became the capital of 3 dynasties. It was the capital of the Qing Dynasty since the Emperor Junji. Current capital of the People's Republic of China.

DOC.Title: Kangxi, Episcopal
DOC.TEXT: Qing Dynasty 4th Emperor (ranking from 1661 to 1722). It is said to be the first name in China history. Three clan 's turbulence flattened, followed by Taiwanese Mr. Zheng to complete the unification of China. Furthermore, in addition to defining the border with Russia and the Nelsinzk treaty, it also appeared outside Mongolia, Qinghai, Tibet. Also encouraged academic, established the foundation of the Qing dynasty.

DOC.Title: The turbulence of the three clan
DOC.TEXT: The rebellion of the Han Chinese commander caused by Kiyoshi's first oppression by Kangxi. It became a major force by calling Wu San Katsura, Guangdong's Tomoki Kiyoshi, Fujian's Shigeru Shigeru as the three clans, who became Qing dynasty and succumbed to the Chinese rebellion, stationed in Yunnan. This rebellion set Qing dynasty into temporary crisis but Kangxi embarked on the mechanism in 1681 and established China dominance.

DOC.Title: Kingdom
DOC.TEXT: A person who was assisted by the Chinese reunification of the Qing dynasty by the Han Chinese commander and was sealed by the kings of various regions.

DOC.Title: Chung Success
DOC.TEXT: After the decline of Ming, the Qing Dynasty and fighting warrior who tried to restore it. Known as being the father of Zhengzhong Ryu and having her Japanese mother. After the surrender to the Qing Dynasty in the Qing Dynasty continued to resist, in 1661 he defeated Dutch forces in Taiwan and continued to resist as a base, but he was sick.

DOC.Title: Zhengzhou Dragon
DOC.TEXT: Father of Zheng success. After surrendering Ming, he surrendered to Hayabaya, but failed to persuade Zheng success to the Qing Dynasty and was executed soon.

DOC.Title: Country's name
DOC.TEXT: The alias given to Chung Success. This is called because it is given the kingdom name (surname of Zhu which is the last name of Ming) from the king of Nam Ming to respond to the resurrection of Mincho. Through the Chikamatsu Monzaemon's puppet joruri "Nationality (surname) grand battlefield" which made the main character of Chung the success, this name is widely known.

DOC.Title: Zeelandia Castle, Anping Castle
DOC.TEXT: 1624 A Dutch citadel built in a small island in southwest Taiwan. In the year 61, Zheng success succeeded and the Dutch retreated.

DOC.Title: Prodigal Order
DOC.TEXT: A law that ordered residents living in the coastal area of ​​China to forced relocation from the coastal area to the outback. It is aimed at isolating Mr. Zheng from Taiwan who is trying to counter the continent, but it was canceled in 1984 after defeating Mr. Chung.

DOC.Title: Mr. Chung Taiwan
DOC.TEXT: In 1661 Zheng Success began to devastate the Dutch people and made it a base against counter-serge. After the death of Zheng success, Chieko's Chung Sheng was followed, multiplied by the turbulence of the three clans, attacked the continent failed but returned to Taiwan. After the death, under the attack of Qing, Mr. Zhen got into Qing during 3 generations 22 years, and the unification of China in 83 years was completed.

DOC.Title: Treaty of Nerchinsk
DOC.TEXT: Treaty that Kwon Ki embraced Russia of Peter I who came south. The first treaty which Kiyoshi joined in a position equal to that of a foreign country. We decided the border demarcation between the Argun River and Xinghai Anping, the trade of both countries, and the treatment of cross-border people.

DOC.Title: Jungal Department
DOC.TEXT: A part of Eurat. It became powerful from the latter half of the 17th century and became a prime in the early 18th century. However, it was hit by Kangxi Imperial Conquest, and it was destroyed in 1758 by a heavy invasion from Dry Emperor beginning in the mid 18th century.

DOC.Title: Qinghai
DOC.TEXT: It corresponds to the present Qinghai province in northeast Tibetan plateau. Mongolian people entered the Ming Dynasty, and the Qing dynasty and Yongzheng emperor took over as the clan division in Qing dynasty.

DOC.Title: Emperor Yongzheng, Sejong
DOC.TEXT: Qing Dynasties 5th Emperor (ranking 1722-35). Created reform of the Flag system and military service, strengthened the monarch dictatorship. Also prohibited the mission of Christianity in 1724, concluded a treaty with Russia in 27 years, confirmed the borders and methods of trade.

DOC.Title: Kafta convention
DOC.TEXT: Border and trade treaty concluded between Qing and Russia during the Yongzheng Emperor period. The border demarcation in the direction of Mongolia and the establishment of a trading place at the border were agreed.

DOC.Title: Qianlong, Takaji
DOC.TEXT: Qing Dynasty 6th Emperor (ranking 1735-95). He developed the heyday period following Kangxi Emperor Yongzheng Emperor. Inside, while encouraging academic, such as the editing of the "four owner books", on the other hand, thought suppression such as prohibition and letter prison was carried out. In addition, we have named the Jungal · Circulation division out of the Xinjiang out of it and added it to the clan division, realizing the largest version. A sign of the decline of the Qing Dynasty appeared in the later years.

DOC.Title: Division
DOC.TEXT: It refers to Islamic-type Turkish people (Uighurs) and their areas residing in Tian Shan South Road (East Turkestan). In the 17th century under the control of the Jungal Department, in the middle of the 18th century Qing was conquered. Thereafter, the revolt remained constant, but it was transferred to Xinjiang Province at the end of the 19th century.

DOC.Title: Xinjiang
DOC.TEXT: The area around East Turkistan, including the Jungal basin north of the Tian Shan Mountain Range and the Tarim Basin to the south. In the middle of the 18th century, under the rule of Qianlong during the Qingxian period, it was incorporated under the rule of Qing Dynasty and was named "Xinjiang" (new land). Even after that revolt centered on Islamists occurred frequently, but now it constitutes the Xinjiang Uighur Autonomous Region of the People's Republic of China.

DOC.Title: Examination, Kiyoshi
DOC.TEXT: It was done inheriting the Ming system. Because being a student at a local school became an entrance examination, the school turned into a place just for examination of examination. It was abolished in 1905 at the end of Qing Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Combined use system
DOC.TEXT: Measures to assign the same number of Manchurian and Han Chinese as even number of important positions such as Six Parts.

DOC.Title: Cabinet College Degree
DOC.TEXT: The most important government agency that inherited the Ming system. However, in 1729, after Yongzheng Emperor set up military aircraft, its authority weakened.

DOC.Title: Military aircraft
DOC.TEXT: It was established in 1729, the era of Yongzheng Emperor, the highest institution on the military administration of Qing dynasty. Initially it was established to protect the military secrets when conquering the Jungal Department, but later became a practical supreme institution to replace the Cabinet later on politically. It was abolished in Qing Dynasty in 1911.

DOC.Title: Military Minister
DOC.TEXT: A few ministers that made up military aircraft.

DOC.Title: Six parts
DOC.TEXT: It was the highest administrative institution under the Emperor who inherited the Ming system.

DOC.Title: clan division
DOC.TEXT: It is a collective term of outer Mongolia, Xinjiang, Tibet, Qinghai dominated by Qing. He was supervised by the Minister dispatched from the Philosopher's Office, but a large autonomy was allowed.

DOC.Title: Physicist cleric
DOC.TEXT: The administrative institution that manages the clan division at the central government office in the city of Qing Dynasty. It was renamed in 1638, originated from Mongolia Gomon that was established after Taojong inner Mongolian reign. In the Qianlong Empire the organization was further improved by the increase of the clan divisions.

DOC.Title: Township
DOC.TEXT: Strong person in local society. A person who passed the examination, a person who has experienced bureaucracy and retired to the hometown. Social and political opinion power in rural area is great.

DOC.Title: hairdressing, pureness
DOC.TEXT: Hairstyle is a custom of the northern ethnic groups which shaves the head hair, leaves a part and knits long. When Kiyoshi exercised control over the mainland of China, he forced this as a proof of obedience to the Han Chinese men and convicted severely those who did not comply.

DOC.Title: letter prison
DOC.TEXT: The ideological oppression often carried out in the era of Qianlong from Kangxi. He imprisoned a person who wrote texts and letters of dissatisfaction / antisemal content.

DOC.Title: Prohibition
DOC.TEXT: He issued a forbiddance decree for thinking control in China, burned down anti-government books, and prohibited publication. Or the book that was the subject. It was performed severely in Qing Dynasty, especially in Qingxian period.

DOC.Title: Hall · Public place
DOC.TEXT: Buildings and unions built in urban areas for the purpose of mutual aid and fellowship by the same village or businessmen in the same industry. We also set up lodgings and warehouses. It began around Song Dynasty and developed in Ming and Qing.

DOC.Title: Shanxi merchant
DOC.TEXT: A merchant group from Shanxi Province. He worked as a political merchant, and he was also active in the finance industry as a Qing dynasty.

DOC.Title: Shinan Merchant, Huzhou Merchant
DOC.TEXT: A merchant group from Anhui Province, Huizhou. He worked nationwide mainly on salt traders, especially in Gangnam overwhelming Shanxi merchants.

DOC.Title: Regional Bank, Geological Taxation
DOC.TEXT: Tax imposed on ownership of the fields.

DOC.Title: Ding Bin, Duty Free
DOC.TEXT: Personal head tax imposed on adult males.

DOC.Title: Party Bank
DOC.TEXT: The tax system of the Qing dynasty implemented as an alternative to the Single Stagger Act. A system that collects the head tax (Ding Bin) in the land tax (regional bank) and collects them all at once, thereby eliminating the head taxes. Beginning from the era of Kangxi, it was carried out almost nationwide during Yongzheng Emperor.

DOC.Title: Seaside
DOC.TEXT: Customs established at the opening port of Qing Dynasty. In 1684, the trade with foreign countries was lifted after the ban was released, and the following year, it was installed in four places such as Guangzhou.

DOC.Title: Guangzhou
DOC.TEXT: In 1757, the arrival of a European ship was limited to one port in Guangzhou, making it a public trade.

DOC.Title: public direction
DOC.TEXT: Refers to a union of patent merchants who monopolized foreign trade in Qing Dynasty and Guangzhou. Because of 13 unions there was called Guangdong Xixiang, but then the number of unions has changed. As a result of the Opium War, it was abolished in the Nanjing Treaty of 1842.

DOC.Title: Overseas Chinese, South China Overseas Chinese
DOC.TEXT: It refers to the Chinese who moved abroad. Many people from Guangdong and Fujian originated, and the largest settlers moved towards Southeast Asia, especially in the commercial direction, forming goods, and some people occupying a big position in the political and economic worlds also appeared. It was a migrant who committed the ban on the sea, and since he was regarded as a sanctuary from the Qing Dynasty, it was stronger to serve as a supporter of the anti-campaign movement.

DOC.Title: Anti-Food
DOC.TEXT: Refusal struggle of landowners (landowners) against tax collection by the government. He was intensified by Qing Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Difficult
DOC.TEXT: Megumi Suku's first rebellious movement by his in-house slave (slave).

DOC.Title: Civilian
DOC.TEXT: Resistance movement by urban people. After the end of the day, I rebelled against the pressure of the eunuch and took office.

DOC.Title: White Ransen's Ran
DOC.TEXT: Great peasants rebellion. This caused the stable period of the Qing Dynasty to go.

DOC.Title: Manchu characters
DOC.TEXT: Based on Mongolian letters, it was made at the time of Nuruhachi in 1599 to write Manchu words.

DOC.Title: "Kang-ee gifts"
DOC.TEXT: Thirty scholars involved in the order of Kangxi, completed dictionary. It is divided into 12 collections, and it holds about 42,000 characters. It is regarded as a representative Chinese character dictionary.

DOC.Title: "Ancient and Modern book collection"
DOC.TEXT: The greatest kind book (Chinese encyclopedia) of Chinese history, which was culled in the life of Kangxi and was completed in Yongzheng Emperor period. Ten thousand volumes.

DOC.Title: "Yoshiaki Ayuden"
DOC.TEXT: In order to show the legitimacy of the Qing Dynasty, a book written by the life of Yongzheng Emperor. China originally was a multi-ethnic country, and China's rule of the Qing (Goddess) was orthodox.

DOC.Title: "All four stories"
DOC.TEXT: One large series edited by Qianlong 's life. Collected books of ancient times, mobilized scholars, edited classified into 4 copies (four warehouses) of history, history, child, and collection. 3462 kinds, 79,582 volumes were counted, and seven sets of manuscripts were made.

DOC.Title: Anthropology
DOC.TEXT: Empirical study that seeks authority in reliable literature when revealing Confucian writings. It happened in the end of the year and became a prime time during the Qiaoqing and Chiaoqing, but the character as a practical scholar was lost due to the thought control of the Qing Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Yellow sect
DOC.TEXT: Ming and Qing first thinker. I tried to reproach campaign, I could not serve after the establishment of the Qing Dynasty, I became immersed in science, became the founder of the study of science. The representative work is "Mei Imouto visit".

DOC.Title: Takeshi Kohira
DOC.TEXT: Ming and Qing first thinker. He did not serve the Qing, became the founder of the study science with respect to practical science. The masterpiece is "Nichijo".

DOC.Title: Ohio
DOC.TEXT: Ming and Qing first scholar. He did not serve the Qing as a priest of Ming, but devoted himself to his writings. I insisted on Huawei thought. He left a historical theory such as "Reading Tales".

DOC.Title: Qian Dao
DOC.TEXT: Land owner of Qing Dynasty Study. Established historical research method, and was involved in compilation such as 'dry literature consideration', 'Koichi Oiichi' dryness.

DOC.Title: Earthquake
DOC.TEXT: Land owner of Qing Dynasty Study. Excellent in learning theory and preaching the philosophy of Ki. There are many writings such as "Mencius Liberty".

DOC.Title: Tamadamushi
DOC.TEXT: Land owner of Qing Dynasty Study. Disciples of the earthquake. It is known for research on character / phonology. "Book of papers" in books.

DOC.Title: public sheep
DOC.TEXT: "Spring Autumn" 's "Public guide" as a legitimate academic discipline. In Qing I was not aware of the scientific studies, I insisted on more practical practical use of life and happened. In Qing Dynasty, he insisted on political reform, and became particularly speculated.

DOC.Title: "Red Mansions Dream"
DOC.TEXT: A novel of Qing dynasty. Two-thirds of the whole is Cao Snow Seri, the rest are works of Takanori. Qinglong work of year. Following the prosperity of aristocratic households, it is excellent in depiction of psychology.

DOC.Title: "Confucian Foreign History"
DOC.TEXT: A novel of Qing dynasty. Writer Akizawa. Satirized the enclosure, and inspected the corruption of civil service officials.

DOC.Title: "Liauxe Shiki"
DOC.TEXT: Shimizu's short story novel collection. Volume 16 431 Hen. Age by Kamamatsu. It consists of stories of youkai and satirical works taken from private tale.

DOC.Title: "Chosei-no densetsu"
DOC.TEXT: Qing dynasty play. Haruhiro Hon. 50 Act. A masterpiece depicting the tragic love of Genkyo and Yang Qin got inspiration from Hakaru Ten's "Honkagon Song" etc.

DOC.Title: "Peach flower fanatics"
DOC.TEXT: Qing dynasty play. Perforated boss. 40 act. Historical drama depicting the circumstances of Ming Dynasty on the theme of the tragic love story between literatians and Nago.

DOC.Title: Ishido
DOC.TEXT: 17th century. Unknown birth and death. Megumi Soo's first painter. A descendant of the light room. After the dawn of Ming, he is a birthplace. Excellent for Sanshui painting, well done flower and bird drawing. One person representing Ming Dynasty literature painting.

DOC.Title: Eight Oyama people
DOC.TEXT: Megumi Soo's first painter. Real name is Zhu. A descendant of the light room. After the dawn of Ming, he is a birthplace. They showed their own style of flower birds and mountain water.

DOC.Title: Forbidden City
DOC.TEXT: The palace of the emperor of Ming and Qing dynasty. Emperor Yongle built in Beijing, then was rebuilt greatly into Qing Dynasty. The morning outside of politics and the courtroom, which was a private residence of the emperor, are divided into two groups, a magnificent splendid building group. Currently it is open as the National Palace Museum.

DOC.Title: Jesuits
DOC.TEXT: Catholic founder founded in 1534 by Ignatius-Loyola and others and then played a major role in opposing (anti-) religious reform, approved by the papacy. Particularly active in overseas evangelism is prominent, but especially in Asia, Francisco Xavier and Matteo Ricci left big footprints.

DOC.Title: Francisco Xavier, Francisco Chavier
DOC.TEXT: A Jesuit missionary from Spain. We founded Jesuits with Loyola. Initially, he propagated in India and Southeast Asia, and started evangelism in Japan in 1549. On the way to China evangelism, he died on Kamikawajima outside the port of Guangzhou.

DOC.Title: Mateo = Rich, Masumoto
DOC.TEXT: The Jesuit missionary from Italy, the first Chinese evangelist of the association. He went to Goa · Macau, entered China in 1583, and was allowed to stay in Beijing in 1601. In cooperation with Akira's senior official, Xu Gwan, he was active in missions and teaching Western sciences. He died in Beijing, then was buried in Goa.

DOC.Title: "Total figure of the universal kingdom"
DOC.TEXT: In 1602, the Chinese map version of the world map created by Mateo Ricci. 6 pairs of one pair. Based on the theory of the Earth ball, I drew China at the center of an egg shaped figure, which had a big influence on the Chinese view of the world.

DOC.Title: "Geometric original"
DOC.TEXT: Eucrayides 'geometry' Han translation in the first half. 1607 year publication. Mr. Mateo = Rich's dictation, Xu Gwan described in Chinese.

DOC.Title: Xu Gwan
DOC.TEXT: Ming and scholars / bureaucrats. In 1596 he met Christianity in Guangdong and was baptized in 1603. In cooperation with Mateo Ricci, he worked on the introduction of Western studies including "Geometric Originals" in Chinese, and also worked as a writer for editors such as "Takatsunetsuke" and "Agricultural Policy Full Book".

DOC.Title: Adam = Shiru, Yumeromo
DOC.TEXT: Jesuit missionary from Germany. In 1622 I tried to introduce missionary and Western science at the first courtroom of Ming district in China. In the end of the tomorrow I made Shutsu Kenkyu and Shutenden Calendar, which was done as a "quasi-time calendar". In Qing also he was active as Kinen Atsumi (Observatory Minister).

DOC.Title: Fel Beast, Minami-Hinori
DOC.TEXT: A Jesuit missionary from Belgium. In 1659 in China, he tried to introduce missionary and Western science (calendar method, cannon casting, etc.), with Adam Shahl helping.

DOC.Title: Bouvet, Hakushin
DOC.TEXT: Jesuit missionary from France. In 1685 he was dispatched to China with the life of Louis XIV. He served Kangxi and was involved in the creation of the "master chart of the imperial family" and so on. He left his book "Kangxi Den".

DOC.Title: Regis, Thunder Takashi
DOC.TEXT: Jesuit missionary from France. In 1698 he joined China to serve Kangxi and to create "the full table of the imperial figures" etc.

DOC.Title: "Full list of the shrine"
DOC.TEXT: China's first observed map. In the order of Kangxi, Regis Bouve et al. Made a large-scale survey throughout China and completed in 1718 over 10 years.

DOC.Title: Castiglione, Glorie Ning
DOC.TEXT: Jesuit missionary from Italy. He entered Beijing in 1715 and introduced the Western painting method as a court painter to serve Yongzheng Emperor Qianlong Emperor. I also participated in the design of the Miyake park.

DOC.Title: Yumenako
DOC.TEXT: Reunification of the Qing Dynasty built in the suburbs of Beijing. Castiglione and others participated in the design. The palaces and gardens that blended the baroque style with the Chinese style were said to be the world's most beautiful, but during the Arrow war of 1860, it was destroyed by the British and French Allied Forces.

DOC.Title: Liturgy issue
DOC.TEXT: Controversy over how to propagate in China among Catholic factions. Beginning with the missionary of another faction sued the papacy for the missionary work of the Jesuit missionary who acknowledged the liturgy (Confucius worship, ancestral rituals, etc.). In 1704 Pope Clement IX prohibited participation in the liturgy of the believer, but Kangxi banned the entry and evangelism of the liturgical denies, followed by Yongzheng emphatically forbade the evangelism of Christianity in 1724 did.

DOC.Title: Prohibition of Christianity Missionary
DOC.TEXT: Emperor Yongzheng conducted in 1724. Without banishment outside of the country, repression was loose, so no martyrs like Japan occurred, but missionary abortion.

DOC.Title: Science study
DOC.TEXT: Study that targets the history and culture of China. Interest in Chinese civilization increased in Western Europe through a report on the missionaries who came to China, and began around the 17th century. After that, in particular developed in France, became a field of academic study in the 19th century.

DOC.Title: Burmese, Myanmar
DOC.TEXT: Current Myanmar's main ethnic groups. People whose native language is Burmese of the Sina-Tibetan language. The Pew who was called に in China belongs to this, but the first unified state they built is Pagan morning.

DOC.Title: Pagan morning
DOC.TEXT: Burma's first unified dynasty. The Chinese name is Pig country. Bagan on the left bank of Ilawady Middle East is the capital. The monks of the lower Burma also unified, and Buddhism culture flourished by adopting Buddhist divination from Ceylon. It was destroyed in response to the original invasion.

DOC.Title: Pegou
DOC.TEXT: Below Burma's ancient capital. It is the capital city of Pugu dynasty since 1369, until 1635 in Tungguo dynasty. Prosperous in maritime trade.

DOC.Title: Mong dynasty
DOC.TEXT: The dynasty of the Burmese who ended the confusion since the fall of the Bagan dynasty. Trade with Europe was also carried out, but declined / discontinued in the conflict with Ayutaya morning etc. It revived in the 17th century, international trade also revived, but it declined with the rebellion of the Chinese faction.

DOC.Title: Combow morning, Araunpaya morning
DOC.TEXT: The last dynasty of the Burmese who Arau Paya dismissed the monk and founded the country. It was a heyday in the eighteenth century, the Ayutthaya morning in Thailand was reduced, and the invasion of Qing was rejected. Lost in the war with the British since the beginning of the 19th century the dynasty was destroyed in 1885 and the following year Burma was merged into the British Indian Empire.

DOC.Title: Taksin
DOC.TEXT: The King of Thailand (ranking 1767-82). After the destruction of the Ayutthaya in the morning, he built a dynasty by repelling the intruding Concounge morning, but fell down in rebellion and was executed. It is said that it was mixed with Chinese and Thai.

DOC.Title: Thai
DOC.TEXT: Central Thai ethnic groups. Originally I lived in the Sichuan / Yunnan area, but continued to keep going south for a long period from around the 8th century (there is a theory that it will be later). By the invasion of Mongolia in the 13th century, it immigrated to the Indochina peninsula massively and formed a state by assimilating with indigenous people.

DOC.Title: Sukhothai Morning
DOC.TEXT: The first Thai dynasty established in the Indochinese peninsula. Thai minor countries that were subordinate to Shinzo were independent. The capital is Sukhothai. At the end of the 13 th century, it was at its peak in the era of King Ramkhamhaen, spreading the influential area to the northern part of the Malay Peninsula, and setting the upper buddhist Buddhism as national religion. It declined since the middle of the 15th century, subordinated to the Ayutthaya morning.

DOC.Title: Thai character
DOC.TEXT: In 1283, Rumkhamhaen King of Sukhothai morning enacted the Cambodian letter (Khmer letter) by modifying it.

DOC.Title: Ayutaya Morning
DOC.TEXT: Independent Thai dynasty with Ayutthaya as the capital in the late Sukhothai dynasty. In the 17th century, it dominated the largest territory in Thailand's history, not only in neighboring countries / China, but also in western countries, it prospered with active diplomatic and trade relations. It declined due to the invasion of Tung Dynasty in Burma and was destroyed in the morning of Conborg.

DOC.Title: Rattanakosin morning, Chakri morning
DOC.TEXT: After the confusion after the destruction of the Ayutthaya in the morning, the dynasty Rama I dismissed the Burmese army and built in Thailand. Also called Bangkok Morning. From the middle of the 19th century under the oppression of Britain and France kept independence, became the constitutional kingdom in 1932, now reaches.

DOC.Title: Rama I
DOC.TEXT: Founder of Ratanakosin in the morning (ranking from 1782 to 1809). Also known as the name of Chakri. In the late Ayutthaya ~ dislocation era erupted Burmese power and rise, Bangkok to the capital, the Thai dynasty continued until today. It is also known to protect Buddhism.

DOC.Title: Lao People
DOC.TEXT: Thai ethnic groups. Like the Thai people, it seems that they migrated to the Indochinese peninsula from the southern part of China and now lives from Laos to northern Thailand.

DOC.Title: Laos
DOC.TEXT: Kingdom of the northern Indochina peninsula. In the 14th century, the Lhasan Kingdom was built by the Lao people. After that, it was pressed by the surrounding Vietnam, Burma and Thailand. Although the Buddhist culture flourished in the 16th century, it broke up into three kingdoms in the 18th century and then was under Thai rule. In the late nineteenth century under France 's invasion, it was made a protectorate of France in 1893.

DOC.Title: Cambodia
DOC.TEXT: A nation built in the southern part of the Indochinese Peninsula. The Khmer people (others have another) built the first unified nation Furun south in the Mekong River Basin. In the 6th century, Shinzo became independent from Fenan, destroying Fenan in the 7th century. Masaki broke down in the 8th century, but it was reunified in the 9th century, until the 13th century was at its heyday, Angkor Wat, Angkor Thom was built. It was pressed by Thailand from the beginning of the 13th century, moved the capital to Phnom Penh south in the 15th century, declined with pressure on Vietnam. In the nineteenth century France was interfered as its protective territory.

DOC.Title: Champagne
DOC.TEXT: A country of Cham who was built in the southeastern part of Vietnam under the influence of Indian culture. In China, since the 2nd century, Hayashiro, the ring king since the middle of the 8th century, from the middle of the 9th century it was written as fortune. While struggling with the Chinese dynasties, it flourished by maritime trading.

DOC.Title: Okoshi County, Dibet country
DOC.TEXT: The country name of Vietnam after the Lee Dynasty period. It is after Taicang moved the capital to Hanoi. From the beginning of the 19th century it is called Vietnam.

DOC.Title: Hanoi
DOC.TEXT: The city of Okoshi after Lee (Hue only in the Nguyen dynasty). Lee dragon in Lee Morning, Tokyo in Dynasty. It became Hanoi (Kawachi) in 1831, became the capital of French Indochina in 1987.

DOC.Title: Chen Dynasty
DOC.TEXT: It is the dynasty of Vietnam after Lee morning. In the latter half of the 13th century I fought back the invasion of the Mongolian army three times and fought with Champa. Administrative system · Buddhism culture developed, the character of character was started to be used. It was destroyed by the clan revolting.

DOC.Title: Character, Tunom
DOC.TEXT: In the era of Chen Morning, letters made based on Kanji. It has declined since France was established in the 19th century.

DOC.Title: liberal
DOC.TEXT: The captain of Chen Dynasty. In the rule of Ming 1418 the soldier became independent and opened Ding Dynasty.

DOC.Title: Dynasty
DOC.TEXT: From Ming control Liberty became independent. The capital city is Hanoi, the country is Okoshi. Zhuzhi and national culture developed, but it was destroyed in the Nishiyama morning.

DOC.Title: Mr. Chung
DOC.TEXT: After 1592, the clan who grabbed the real power of the Ding Dynasty. In opposition to influential Ren Nagasu, it was destroyed by the Nishiyama Party's turbulence in 1786, then the Dynasty was destroyed.

DOC.Title: Nenshin
DOC.TEXT: A family of substantial rulers in the south against Chung in the northern part of the late morning. It was annihilated by the Nishiyama army in 1777.

DOC.Title: Guangzhou kingdom, Quang Nam morning
DOC.TEXT: The kingdom of southern Vietnam, dominated by Mr. Ning.

DOC.Title: Hue, Yue
DOC.TEXT: Cities in Central Vietnam. The capital of the Nguyen dynasty.

DOC.Title: Nishiyama Party's Ran, Tyson Party's Ran
DOC.TEXT: In 1773, the rebellion that Nguyen Feng, Feng Lu, Fumie three brothers of Nishiyama-eiguchi in central Vietnam multiplied on the decline of the Dynasty. The three brothers destroyed Ren Ning in 1977 and Mr. Chung in 1986, unified the Vietnam for a short period, built the Nishiyama Morning.

DOC.Title: Nishiyama Party's Natsu
DOC.TEXT: Nishiyama Party leads the Nishiyama morning. The three brothers in Ningbo Family are from Nishiyama village of Nakajima in Middle Southern Vietnam.

DOC.Title: Nishiyama Morning
DOC.TEXT: The unified dynasty of Vietnam continued from Ding Dynasty. The three brothers of the Nishiyama Party Mr. Nen ruled the country for 3 minutes, but it was destroyed by Nanbu Fortress.

DOC.Title: Nguyen Dynasty
DOC.TEXT: The last dynasty in Vietnam. Let Kiyo become a religious country. After the invasion of France since 1858, it was protected as a protectorate in 1983.

DOC.Title: Johor Kingdom
DOC.TEXT: The Islamic harbor city state that the royalty of Melaka built at the southern tip of the Malay Peninsula.

DOC.Title: Kudiri Morning
DOC.TEXT: Dynasty was the capital of Kudiri eastern Java. The Indian epic "Mahabharata" was adapted in Javanese, and a shadow painting play (Wayang) was held and a new culture was born.

DOC.Title: Kingdom of Aceh
DOC.TEXT: Islamic Kingdom which was at the northern end of Sumatra island. Flourished with pepper trade against Malatsuka under the occupation of Portugal. Then it declined due to the pressure of the Netherlands, it was destroyed in the early 20th century.

DOC.Title: Morning Singhusari
DOC.TEXT: The Hindu dynasty flourished in eastern Java. It conflicted with the former year, the year before the original Javanese expedition, was destroyed by civil war.

DOC.Title: Majapahit Kingdom, Majapit Kingdom
DOC.TEXT: Hindu kingdom flourished around eastern Java. It reigned in the middle of the 14th century by rejecting the original interference and temporarily dominated the area comparable to today's Indonesia. It declined with the invasion of Muslims since the late 15th century, and it was destroyed in the 16th century.

DOC.Title: Mataram Kingdom
DOC.TEXT: Islamic school which was built in the eastern part of Java Island on behalf of Majapahit in late 16th century. It was divided in the 18th century and conquered by the Netherlands.

DOC.Title: Kingdom of Banten
DOC.TEXT: Islamic school which occurred in the western part of Java in the first half of the 16th century. Though prosperous in pepper trade, it was dominated by the Dutch East India company and it was destroyed in the 19th century.

DOC.Title: Melaka Kingdom, Malaca Kingdom
DOC.TEXT: A kingdom flourishing in Melaka on the southwest coast of the Malay Peninsula. It greatly prospered in ocean trade, linking the East China Sea-South China Sea Trade Area with the Indian Ocean Trade Zone. In the mid-15th century, the king accepted Islam and became the kingdom of Islam, after that he played a major role in Islamization of the Southeast Asian region. Cooperated with the expedition of Nanhai of Cheng Wen, became a Morning Morning Continent. It was occupied by the Portuguese in the beginning of the 16th century and was destroyed.

DOC.Title: Harbor City State
DOC.TEXT: Harbor City that prospered by maritime trading, further established neighboring areas that produce international goods such as pepper and tin, and formed a city state. Until the 17 th century, it played the role of the rise of Southeast Asian commerce. Okayo in the old days, followed by Shreeviijaya Malacca, Kingdom of Aceh, Kingdom of Banten, Ayutaya morning etc.

DOC.Title: Junk ship
DOC.TEXT: A wooden sailing ship built in China. It has a strong structure reinforced by bulkheads and is suitable for distant navigation with heavy goods loaded, especially after the Song Dynasty, active in ocean trading in China. The large ship called the treasure ship used in the expedition of the South Sea of ​​Cheng Wen was also a junk ship.

DOC.Title: Joseon Dynasty, Mr. Lee Korea
DOC.TEXT: The last dynasty of Korea after Goryeo. The capital is Han Castle. At the beginning of the founding period the royalty was strong, based on Confucianism, enforcement was carried out and the bureaucracy system was improved. It also prospered greatly in terms of culture, such as the establishment of Korean characters (Hangul) and publication by copper type printing. However, since the end of the 15th century party fight intensified, Hideyoshi Toyotomi at the end of the 16th century, under the invasion of Qing in the 17th century, was regarded as a kingdom of Qing. In the 19th century it became a place of conflict between imperialists (especially Russia and Japan), and it was annexed to Japan in 1910.

DOC.Title: Li Chengli, Taico
DOC.TEXT: King of the first Korean dynasty (ranking 1392-98). Born from Koryo's warlord. I repelled the invasion of Yao and gave me a name, I defeated Koryo and ranked himself, and decided the name of Korea the following year. Together with Ming, worked hard for internal judgment, protected Confucianism (Zhuji school).

DOC.Title: Hanyang, Han Castle
DOC.TEXT: The capital of the Korean dynasty. The official name is Hanju Fu. Tae Yi Chengli took the capital in 1394.

DOC.Title: Zhuzhi University, Joseon Dynasty
DOC.TEXT: Taejon made Zhuji school government official and strengthened the bureaucracy following the obligation.

DOC.Title: Examination, Joseon Dynasty
DOC.TEXT: It was also carried out during the Goryeo era, but it was widely practiced in the era of the Korean dynasty. Entrance qualifications have also been expanded, but successful applicants almost monopolized the rich group of both groups.

DOC.Title: Law of Shigeta
DOC.TEXT: Law Promotion Law to bureaucrats started by Lee Shengli. It confiscated the land of aristocracy in the Goryeo Era and provided land (Fukuda) to bureaucrats according to the height of government office newly. After that, when the number of bureaucrats increased, it became difficult to maintain the system and was abolished in the 16th century.

DOC.Title: Taejong
DOC.TEXT: King of the Third King of the Joseon Dynasty (ranking 1401-18). Fifth child of Tao. In terms of domestic politics, he gave results such as improving the government system, reforming the Tasan, encouraging academics, printing the enclosure.

DOC.Title: Sejong
DOC.TEXT: King of the Fourth Generation of the Joseon Dynasty (ranking 1418-50). We have made great results both inside and outside such as improvement of government system, promotion of agriculture, expansion of the territory up to the Yanbao River. While encouraging enforcement of Honghuong Masan (Hangeul), the promotion of publishing projects and Confucianism, it also left a big footprint in terms of culture such as suppressing Buddhism. It is regarded as the first koto of the Korean dynasty.

DOC.Title: Copper type
DOC.TEXT: In the Korean dynasty, the world's first copper typography was put into practical use. In 1403, a casting place was set up by the order of Tajong, copper typography was made, and it was used for printing books. In addition, it became the basis of Keicho typographic edition of Japan.

DOC.Title: Masayuki Shimizu, Hangul
DOC.TEXT: In 1446 the Korean character that Sejong was named under the name of "Masayoshi Shigemon". It is a phonetic alphabet of 28 vowels / consonants total (24 characters at present). Originally it was not used by intellectuals, rather it was used among the commoners, but it was renamed "Hangul" (great character) under Japanese rule and it was officially used.

DOC.Title: "Shikoku Dai-ichi"
DOC.TEXT: The basic code of the Korean dynasty which was compiled by the command of the seventh generation (rank 1455 ~ 68). It was completed in 1485, and several revisions were subsequently repeated. It consists of 6 civil servants, doors, rewards, soldiers, imprisonment, and engineering.

DOC.Title: Both team
DOC.TEXT: The political and social privilege hierarchy of the Koryo / Korean dynasty era. Politically, it monopolized the two high-ranking official positions of the sentence group and the samurai group, became a feudal land owner economically, and was granted various privileges such as exemption of military service and impeachment. However, repeating the party faction, it contributed to the decline of the Korean dynasty.

DOC.Title: Invasion of Korea
DOC.TEXT: Aggressive war by Toyotomi Hideyoshi. The Japanese army was dominant at the time due to the Korean side's armed deficiency and party fight, the dominance of Japanese army guns, but due to the complete defeat of the Japanese navy, the strong resistance of the Korean farmers, Ming Dynasty, etc., the death of Hideyoshi It was canceled. Both Korea and Ming also suffered a great blow by this.

DOC.Title: Warrant of Imjin · Ding Roost
DOC.TEXT: The designation in Korea against the Korean invasion war of Hideyoshi.

DOC.Title: Yi Sun-sin
DOC.TEXT: The captain of the Korean dynasty. We strengthened the military and destroyed the Japanese navy in Hideyoshi 's invasion of Korea. When I broke the Japanese navy in the 1598 battle of the Russian Federation, I was killed in the battle but it is regarded as the hero of the emergency.

DOC.Title: Turtle ship
DOC.TEXT: A warship ship that increased strength by covering the deck, said to have been invented by Lee Sun-sin.

DOC.Title: Tibetan Buddhism, Lamma
DOC.TEXT: Mahayana Buddhism in Tibet was established in association with the indigenous Bonnism. It also developed in Mongolia under the protection of Yuan dynasty.

DOC.Title: Lhasa
DOC.TEXT: The capital of Tibet. Lhasa means "the land of Buddha". Although it was blessed with fertile land, it became the center of politics and culture of Tibet since Sonzen = Gumbo set in the 7th century.

DOC.Title: Potara Palace
DOC.TEXT: 11 magnificent palaces built in the era of the 17th century Dalai-Rama V in the summit of Marrópol (Akayama) suburb of Lhasa which is reported as Sonchen-Gambo's palace site. After that, it became the palace of the past Dalai-Lama.

DOC.Title: live Buddha
DOC.TEXT: It is said to be reincarnation of Tibetan Buddhism High priest. It was institutionalized in connection with the method of inheritance of the teaching huge faction that forbade the wife's band. Choose from infants born within a year in the province designated by Lama as a will and make it a reincarnation. It also took effect in Qing dynasty Tibet and domestic and foreign Mongolia.

DOC.Title: Red Hat School, Red Teacher
DOC.TEXT: A faction of Tibetan Buddhism. It is also called a ninima school. In the 14th century, after the establishment of the Hat Hat by the reform of Tsongkapa, it became a minority.

DOC.Title: Tonkapa
DOC.TEXT: Tibetan Buddhist reformer, founder of Huang Shi Tibetan Buddhism. In response to the depravity of the traditional Tibetan Buddhism, the Huang school was opened with insisting on severe precepts and virtues.

DOC.Title: Yellow Hat, Yellow School
DOC.TEXT: A faction of Tibetan Buddhism that Tsunkapa built in the 14th century. It is also called Gerk School. We observe severe precepts such as drinking and strict prohibition of wife zones. It became the mainstream of Tibetan Buddhism on behalf of the Red Teacher (Red Hat School), and since the 17th century it became a leadership force in both politics and religion.

DOC.Title: Dalai = Lama
DOC.TEXT: The title of the highest authority of teachers and politics of Tibetan Buddhism. Dalai means "Ocean", Rama means "Master". It is the honorific title given by Altan-Han, but the first generation is a disciple of Zonkapa in the 15th century. From the 16th century, "inheritance" began to be handed over.

DOC.Title: Pass, Paka
DOC.TEXT: A high priest of the Tibetan Buddhist Saky faction of the 13th century. Sakya is a Tibetan Buddhism faction established in the 11th century on the basis of Western Tibet. Paspa means the saint. He served Fabylai and instructed the politics and culture of Yuan dynasty.

DOC.Title: Ryukyu
DOC.TEXT: Designation from the first for the Okinawa Islands. In the latter part of the 14th century, a prominent mentor, in the beginning of the 15th century Mr. Tadashi Sanno unified, clearly morning. In 1609, Mr. Satsuma Shimazu was invited, and since then it has become the shape of both Chinese and Chinese genera.

DOC.Title: Shihanji
DOC.TEXT: The King of the Kingdom of Nakayama who unified the Ryukyus for the first time (ranking 1422-39).

DOC.Title: King Nakayama
DOC.TEXT: Nakayama, Minamiyama and Kitayama were named after the Ryukyu King since the unification of Nakayama Wangshou in the beginning of the 15th century.

DOC.Title: Shuri ___
DOC.TEXT: City of Ryukyu dynasty. Eastern part of the present Okinawa prefecture Naha city.

DOC.Title: Bimonthly regime
DOC.TEXT: To belong to different regimes at the same time. Ryukyu was taxed after being defeated by Mr. Shimazu, but he continued his tribute to Ming and Qing Dynasty as well.

DOC.Title: Kamakura Shogunate
DOC.TEXT: Japan 's first samurai government that Yoritomo opened in Kamakura. Substantially established in 1185 guardian / standing placement. In 1192, Yoritomo 's Shogun' s General Shogun 's appointment took over the name and reality. Following the disconnection of General Genji, the enforcement politics of Mr. Hojyo was held and continued until 1333.

DOC.Title: Yoritomo Morning
DOC.TEXT: A warrior who opened the Kamakura shogunate.

DOC.Title: Mangero attack, Genji
DOC.TEXT: 1274 (Fumiya 11), 81 (Hiroshi 4) refers to the original invasion of Japan twice a year. Both samurai 's success and repulsion by storm, nevertheless exhaustion was bad, causing the Kamakura Shogun to collapse.

DOC.Title: North-South morning conflict
DOC.TEXT: Orthodox dispute after the failure of "New Construction of Jinba" failure. It occurred between Yakuno Daikakuji (South Korea) who embarked Emperor Godaigo and Kimoto no Kenkyu (North Korea) of Kyoto who embraced Emperor Komei.

DOC.Title: Wa Hao
DOC.TEXT: It is a collective name of Japanese pirates and business entrants who worked during the 13th-16th centuries. Until the end of the 14th century when the unified government of Goryeo and Ming declined, the coast of Shandong province of Korea and China was destroyed. After that, it temporarily calmed down due to the conquest by Li Chengli and the implementation of mating trade between the two rice. In the 16 th century, it revitalized again from the Yangtze River basin to the coastal area of ​​South China, but its central power group moved to the Chinese group.

DOC.Title: Muromachi shogunate
DOC.TEXT: Mr. Ashikaga's samurai government opened.

DOC.Title: Ashikaga Yoshimitsu
DOC.TEXT: Muromachi shogunate third generic army. 1392 realized the reunification of the North and North and the Morning, opened diplomatic relations with the 1401 age, sealed by the King of Japan from the Ming, realized mating trade.

DOC.Title: Mating trade
DOC.TEXT: Trade made by tally given to trade countries to prove that Ming is a regular trade ship. Beginning in the early days of Hongwu Emperor, Japan began to give tribute to the Muromachi shogunate in 1404 during the Yongle Empire in 1404.

DOC.Title: Ningbo Case
DOC.TEXT: Military conflict case between Mr. Hosokawa and Mr. Ouchi over engagement trade, which occurred at the port Ningbo in China. The Muromachi shogunate declined and occurred while moving to Mr. Hosokawa, who has real rights of mating trade with Sakai merchants, and Mr. Ouchi who joins Hakata merchant.

DOC.Title: Warring States Period, Japan
DOC.TEXT: After the turbulence of Neniti, the era when nationwide Daimyo fought for about a century. It is the era of Shimokoshi, the Guardian Daimyo fell and the Sengoku Daimyo emerged. It was concluded with the progress of nationwide unification by Nobunaga and Hideyoshi.

DOC.Title: gun
DOC.TEXT: It is the etymology that called the firearm which the former army used to attack Mongolia. A rifle (fire-guzzle) flowed in 1543 by Portuguese's Tanegashima drift, promoted rapidly, and promoted unification of the universe.

DOC.Title: Francisco Xavier, Francisco Chavier
DOC.TEXT: Jesuit missionary. He came to Kagoshima in 1549 and propagated with permission of Mr. Shimazu. Although I went to Tokyo afterwards, I was not allowed to propagate missionary work and I was permitted missionary work by Mr. Otomo in Yamaguchi. After that I went to China, but I died near Guangzhou.

DOC.Title: Oda Nobunaga
DOC.TEXT: Warrior at the end of the Sengoku period. I am from Owari. In 1573 he destroyed the Muromachi Shogunate and promoted reunification of the heaven, but fell down at Honnouji Tsuge.

DOC.Title: Toyotomi Hideyoshi
DOC.TEXT: Served Nobunaga from farmers, succeeded the unified business after Nobunaga's death, and achieved this in 1590.

DOC.Title: Invasion of Korea
DOC.TEXT: Hideyoshi 's Korean invasion war. It was stopped by the resistance of the Korean people and the death of Hideyoshi.

DOC.Title: Bunroku · Keicho's role
DOC.TEXT: Designation in Japan of Hideyoshi's soldiers in Korea.

DOC.Title: Vessel ship
DOC.TEXT: A trade ship with a document (vermiform seal) that pushed a red seal as a permit for foreign trade. It began full-scale in the early Edo period and was held until the ban on travel in 1635 by Tokugawa Iemitsu. He was active mainly in the Southeast Asian region.

DOC.Title: Sakai
DOC.TEXT: Since the latter half of the 15th century it prospered in trade with mating trade and southern barbarian trade. Although it was a kind of free city where autonomy centering around the traders and others was done, it was suppressed by Hideyoshi and it faded.

DOC.Title: Hakata
